intro: Combining the rich taste of Asiago & Cheddar cheeses with the subtlety of chopped scallions just seemed natural.
name: Cheddar & Scallion CheeseSticks
Sweet Baby Ray's BBQ Sauce
intro: SBR Original's mouthwatering blend has captured the minds and taste buds of fans around the world. While we love every member of our family of sauces equally, the sweet, award-winning, taste of SBR Original will always have a special place in our hearts.
ingredients: http://www.sweetbabyrays.com/getattachment/040a2744-da57-4670-ab78-3470489fe641/Original-Barbecue.aspx

name: Williams-Sonoma Chinese Five Spice Powder
intro: A classic Chinese spice blend, this aromatic mixture is traditionally used to season roast pork and duck. Ours combines fragrant star anise with spicy Szechuan peppercorns and the sweetness of cinnamon and cloves. Finely ground fennel seeds balance and unite the flavors.
ingredients: Szechuan pepper, cinnamon, star anise, fennel, cloves.
Sea Salt, Japanese Matcha Powder.
intro: Sprinkle on for vibrant color and subtly sweet flavor.Gorgeous color and an initial slight vegetal taste, followed by lingering sweetness defines our Green Tea Sea Salt. Made with the finest stone ground Japanese green tea powder, our Green Tea Sea Salt's delicate flavor lends itself to a broad range of dishes, from edamame, tempura, and sautéed greens to vanilla deserts, ice cream, and pastries. It's brilliant color and delicate aroma make it a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for exquisite flavor and sophisticated color contrast.
name: Green Tea Sea Salt

ingredients: Oregano, Thyme, Black Pepper, Ground Celery Seed, Red Pepper, Paprika, Salt, Onion and Garlic.
intro: Louisiana is now as close as your kitchen. A dynamic blend of spicy, bright, and soulful flavors, the Taste of Cajun brings the taste of the Bayou to your kitchen. Apply spices to give grilled vegetables a burst of flavor, or use for traditional Cajun blackening of shellfish, seafood, meats, and poultry. Mix the Taste of Cajun into ground meats for spicy Cajun burgers or meatballs, or sprinkle on chicken wings or French fries for a zesty kick.
name: Taste of Cajun

ingredients: Ginger, Basil, Red Pepper, Cumin, Cardamom, Black Pepper, Garlic, Sugar, Onion, Red Bell Peppers, Cilantro, Turmeric Extract and Garlic Oil.
intro: Thailand is now as close as your kitchen. A racy blend of spicy, sweet, and zesty flavors, the Taste of Thailand brings the flavors of Thailand to your kitchen. Apply the spices liberally to impart a rich Thai flavor to meats, seafood, grains and vegetables, or use as a rub for beautiful color and a subtler flavor. Taste of Thailand is also wonderful as a marinade or sauce: mix a generous helping of the spice into a cup of coconut cream for a distinctly Thai flavor.
name: Taste of Thailand

ingredients: Basil, Oregano, Red Bell Peppers, Garlic, Green Bell Peppers, Black Pepper, Fennel and Rosemary.
intro: Tuscany is now as close as your kitchen. A fragrant blend of rich, sweet, and peppery flavors, the Taste of Tuscany brings the flavors of Italy to your kitchen. Apply the herbs liberally to impart a distinctly Italian flavor to pastas, poultry, cooked vegetables, salads and fish. The Taste of Tuscany's slightly varied consistency and bright aroma make it the perfect final touch for bruschetta and crostini.
name: Taste of Tuscany

ingredients: Salt, Red Pepper, Yeast Extract, Natural Flavors, Extract of Paprika.
intro: Sprinkle on for bold color and fiery flavor. Sharp, spicy taste and vibrant color define our Red Cayenne Salt. Utilize its intense flavor to bring life to guacamole, poultry, pizzas, steaks and sauces, or elevate and beautify margaritas by rimming the glass with our signature salt. Its vibrant color makes our Red Cayenne Salt a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just prior to serving for a piquant flavor and stunning color contrast.
name: Red Cayenne Salt

ingredients: Salt, Paprika, Black Pepper, Garlic, Cumin, Oregano, Red Pepper, Cilantro.
intro: Cyprus is now as close as your kitchen. An energetic blend of peppery, sweet, and warm flavors, this authentic spice brings the Taste of Cyprus to your kitchen. A Mediterranean blend traditionally used to season lamb and flavor gyros, this spice adds a savory warmth to vegetable and grain dishes like eggplant, couscous, and lentils. Taste of Cyprus imparts a burst of flavor and beautiful color when sprinkled on Greek yogurt, hummus, or tzatiki.
name: Taste of Cyprus

ingredients: Sea Salt, Italian Melanosporum Black Truffle.
intro: Sprinkle on for deep, richly nuanced flavor. The impossibly rich, seductive flavor of black truffles defines our Truffle Sea Salt. Made from Italian sea salt and a generous heaping of Italian black truffles, this salt elevates simple dishes into gastronomically stunning masterworks. Add distinctive, profoundly decadent flavor to foods ranging from roasted zucchini, grilled meats, and eggs, to popcorn and French fries. Large, plentiful specs of truffle and its deep umami flavor make our Truffle Sea Salt a perfect finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for a beautiful bouquet and lingering succulent flavor.
name: Italian Black Truffle Sea Salt

ingredients: Salt, Garlic, Black Pepper, Red Bell Pepper, Parsley.
intro: Elevate simple dishes to signature favorites. A lively blend of bold, zesty flavors, our authentic Garlic Pepper Rub adds full-bodied flavor to whatever is on the menu. Toss with salads, pasta, rice, and vegetables, or rub on meats, shellfish, poultry, and seafood prior to grilling for a spirited piquant taste. Our Garlic Pepper Rub is also wonderful as a marinade: mix a generous helping into a cup of soy sauce and allow food to marinate for three to four hours.
name: Garlic Pepper Rub

ingredients: Paprika, Garlic, Oregano, Black Pepper, Salt, Red Pepper, Coriander, White Pepper, Fenugreek, Fennel, Nutmeg, Cardamom, Cloves, Basil, Rosemary, Celery, Thyme, Marjoram, Ginger, Cumin, Cinnamon and Turmeric.
intro: The Southwest is now as close as your kitchen. A full flavored blend of warm piquant flavors, the Taste of the Southwest brings the flavors of the American Southwest to your kitchen. Use as a rub to add rich, smoky flavor to meats, poultry, seafood and shellfish, or sprinkle on roasted vegetables just prior to serving for beautiful color and flavorful heat. Taste of the Southwest is also wonderful as a marinade or sauce: mix a generous helping of the spice into a cup of sour cream for a distinctly Tex-Mex flavor.
name: Taste of the Southwest

ingredients: Chives, Dill Tips, Basil Leaves, Chervil, Tarragon, White Pepper and Parsley.
intro: Bordeaux is now as close as your kitchen. A savory blend of warm, fresh, and light flavors, the Taste of Bordeaux brings the refined flavors of French wine country to your kitchen. Apply the spices liberally to bring the refined taste of French cuisine to your poultry, salad, seafood, and potato dishes. Taste of Bordeaux elevates egg dishes to something truly special: try on quiches, omelets, and poached or scrambled eggs.
name: Taste of Bordeaux

ingredients: Natural smoked sea salt.
intro: Sprinkle on for toasty color and a rich smoky flavor. Deep Alderwood smoke flavor and a mottled mahogany color define our Natural Smoked Sea Salt. Utilize its remarkably savory flavor on chicken, pork, potatoes, burgers, and add real depth to foods cooked on gas-fired grills. Its sparkling hazel color makes our Natural Smoked Sea Salt a beautiful finishing salt: sprinkle on foods just before serving for full-bodied flavor and a dappled luster.
name: Natural Smoked Sea Salt

ingredients: Dried strawberries, lemon peel, thyme, cilantro.
intro: California's answer to Herbs de Provence! A delightful composition of savory, zesty, and sweet notes, Taste of California is a rich, flavorful blend of the natural bounty of California. Dried strawberries lend beautiful color and a lingering sweetness, cilantro, thyme and tarragon add depth and warmth, the natural zest of lemon peels brings a refreshing sharpness, and a light sprinkle of Pacific sea salt binds all the flavors together. Apply the Taste of California to fish, chicken, vegetable and pork dishes prior to cooking, or sprinkle on to fresh salads for vibrant color and complexity of flavor. Taste of California works beautifully as a marinade or sauce too: mix in a generous helping of the blend into a cup of yogurt or coconut cream and savor the rich flavors of the Golden State!
name: Taste of California

ingredients: Sea Salt, Rosemary.
intro: Sprinkle on for tantalizingly refreshing herby flavor. The wonderful smell of rosemary and sharp, refreshing straight-from-the-herb-garden flavor define our Rosemary Sea Salt. It's wonderful as a finishing salt, sprinkled on just before serving to add succulent flavor to foods like pizza, fresh pasta, and roasted or mashed potatoes. The rosemary flavor pairs especially with game meats: rub onto pork, rabbit, pheasant, or deer prior to cooking and enjoy a perfect flavor match.
name: Rosemary Sea Salt

ingredients: Sea Salt, Ginger.
intro: Sprinkle on for crisp flavor and sharp sweetness. Golden color and a refreshingly sharp, crisp taste define our Ginger Sea Salt. Made in small batches with crumbly sea salt and freshly dehydrated ginger, our ginger sea salt's distinctive flavor pairs equally well with savory and sweet dishes. Sprinkle in while stir frying veggies for bright, Thai-style flavor, or enjoy with deserts like vanilla ice cream, sticky rice, or cherry pie. Our Ginger Sea Salt also lends a satisfying tang to oriental-style veggie meals: try with bok choy, roasted broccoli, or even use as an accent in a fresh arugula salad.
name: Ginger Sea Salt

ingredients: Salt, Chili Pepper, Yeast Extract, Spices, Natural Smoke Flavor, Extract of Paprika.
intro: Sprinkle on for a satisfyingly smoky, slightly sweet, and perfectly spicy flavor. A wonderfully robust smoky flavor, layered with sweet and spicy accents defines our Ancho Chile Salt. Superb as a finishing salt, sprinkle on just before serving to enhance the flavor of foods like tacos, burgers, corn and green beans. The ancho flavor acts as a catalyst for flavor, and when used as a rub will bring out the best in steaks, egg dishes, and poultry.
name: Ancho Chile Salt

intro: Roasted peanuts, Ohio honey, loads of toasted fresh-ground coconut. Subtle cayenne pepper finish. A complex combination of salty, savory, sweet, and heat melts on the palate.
name: Bangkok Peanut Pint

intro: Slowly toasted sugar mixed with generous amounts of sea salt, cream, and vanilla beans. Nostalgic and warm, with a nutty finish that goes on for miles.
name: Salty Caramel Sauce

intro: Our from-scratch ice cream sandwiches can be eaten whole, cut in half, or quartered, then shared with friends. Just slice, circulate throughout the party, and serve. A collection of flavors: SALTY CARAMEL WITH SMOKED ALMONDS, SNOWY COCONUT, OATMEAL CREAM, CHOCOLATE HAZELNUT, CHOCOLATE TRUFFLE WITH WHITE CHOCOLATE PEPPERMINT
name: Holiday Ice Cream Sandwich Collection

intro: Mouth-filling and palate-gripping with a pleasingly dry finish. The most amount of bittersweet chocolate and Direct- and Fair-Trade-Certified cocoa and the least amount of anything else. Like the inside of a super-rich chocolate truffle.
name: Dark Chocolate Pint

intro: Concentrated milk chocolate ice cream, toasted coconut, and La Boîte’s Bombay N.3 sweet, mild curry blend of clove, turmeric, fenugreek, and other spices.
name: Milk Chocolate Bombay N.3 Pint

intro: Voluptuous vanilla ice cream. Rich and full-flavored, with notes of jasmine and honey. Made with Direct- and Fair-Trade-Certified African vanilla beans reserved exclusively for Jeni's by Ndali Estate in Uganda.
name: Ndali Estate Vanilla Bean Pint

intro: A perfect balance of salty and sweet: sugar caramelized in our kitchen, blended with sea salt and grass-grazed Ohio milk. Initial notes of burnt sugar give way to mouthwatering saltiness.
name: Salty Caramel Pint

intro: Ground Intelligentsia Black Cat espresso beans steeped in cream. The sweet, complex flavor and pungent aroma of fresh espresso is encapsulated and translated perfectly.
name: Intelligentsia Black Cat Espresso Pint

intro: Fresh, tart, and aromatic lemon juice blended with grass-grazed Ohio milk and ultra-creamy biodynamic organic yogurt. Simple and delicious, it’s Jeni’s longtime favorite.
name: Lemon Buttermilk Frozen Yogurt Pint
Mother In Law's Kimchi Napa Cabbage Kimchi
intro: Our Napa Cabbage Kimchi is handmade using napa cabbage, the finest chile peppers, natural ingredients and no preservatives. Spiced with an authentic recipe of specially selected chile peppers, the kimchi has natural depths of flavor that combine spicy complexity and savoriness. Natural fermentation makes it a healthy probiotic food that is good for your digestion.

name: Mother In Law's Kimchi Vegan Napa Cabbage Kimchi
intro: Our Vegan Napa Cabbage Kimchi has all the zest, spice and flavor of our Napa Cabbage Kimchi but was made without using any shellfish. Hand-made using all-natural products, the Vegan Kimchi is a raw, fermented food that’s filled with natural probiotics that aid digestion.

name: Mother In Law's Kimchi Gochujang Paste
intro: Gochujang is the most popular pantry staples in Korea. Use as you would tomato paste in cooking, dips, sauces or sandwich spread for spicy umami flavors. Our signature Gochu (chile) Jang (fermented paste) is made by using time honored traditional methods with no high fructose sweeteners or msg.

name: Mother In Law's Kimchi Korean chile pepper flakes (gochugaru)
intro: Good quality chile pepper flakes is the secret to making great-tasting kimchi. We select only the finest domestic chile pepper flakes to bring you our custom blend of gochugaru. With its signature fruity, complex, earthy spice notes and crimson color, our gochugaru will yield spicy, complex, delicious kimchi that doesn't overpower the character of the vegetables. You'll notice a remarkable difference.

name: Mother In Law's Kimchi White Napa Cabbage Kimchi
intro: Our mild, vegan kimchi is crisp, delicate and effervescent like a glass of Champagne. With no spice, the delicious taste of pickled umami flavors shines through. Produced in a facility where shellfish is present.

name: Mother In Law's Kimchi Muu Daikon Radish Kimchi
intro: Muu Daikon Radish Kimchi is made using fresh daikon radishes mixed with our special selection of chile peppers and all natural ingredients. Fermented to the ideal point where it maintains a pleasant crunch coupled with a complex chile punch, it makes an ideal complement to grilled meats, noodles, or rice. Comes cut in bite-size cubes.

name: Tito's Handmade Vodka
intro: DOUBLE GOLD SAN FRANCISCO SPIRITS COMPETITION. The only vodka made in small batches in an old fashioned Pot Still; exceptionally clean and really smooth; incomparable in everyway!
Dry roasted, no-shell pumpkin seeds with all-natural sea salt. Simple, but believe it or not, it took years to perfect the crunch and juuuust the right amount of sea salt.
name: Superseedz Sea Salt 5-ounce bag

intro: If you're looking for a snack that's more FLAVOR than FIRE, you're in luck. Somewhat Spicy is a savory blend of aged cayenne pepper, garlic, sea salt and just enough spice to satisfy without the inconvenience of the runny nose.
name: Superseedz Somewhat Spicy 5-ounce bag

intro: Hello there, you healthy snacking exhibitionist! Here's our most free-spirited flavor. No salt, no seasoning, no spice…just au naturale, birthday suit, stark naked, nothin' but the naked truth. Enjoy privately or with very close friends. Hot tub also optional.
name: Superseedz Really Naked 5-ounce bag

intro: Some like it hot, which is why we made sure Super Spicy not only has a kick, but may even leave a mark. Garlic, sea salt, cayenne, black pepper, habanero, red crushed pepper. Is that steam coming out of your ears?
name: Superseedz Super Spicy 5-ounce bag
Milk Chocolate Truffle Bar
intro: Creamy milk chocolate...an old favorite. This classic truffle bar from Seattle Chocolates now boasts 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified™ cocoa. 2.5 oz.

name: Dark Chocolate Truffle Bar
intro: One of our mainstay truffle bars: rich and smooth dark chocolate that's never bitter or chalky. Now features 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified cocoa. 2.5 oz.

name: Jcoco Noble Dark Chocolate Bar
intro: Belgium enjoys the reputation of producing the finest chocolate in the world. This is where we source our 72% couverture noble dark chocolate bar. It is deep, smooth and chocolatey with a wonderful mouth feel and no trace of bitterness. We then add inclusions of coated Casa Luker cocoa nibs from Colombia. The nibs are toasted then enrobed in dark chocolate. Includes three individually wrapped 1 oz bars. All-natural, non-GMO, vegan, gluten-free, and Kosher.

name: Extreme Dark Truffle Bar
intro: This hot pink truffle bar boasts 100% of net profits go to fight women's breast cancers and all-natural ingredients with a smooth meltaway center. Pure, intense dark chocolate. 2.5 oz.

name: Dark Chocolate Truffle
intro: One of our mainstay truffles: rich and smooth dark chocolate that's never bitter or chalky. Available in 2.5 lb (about 120 pieces) and 5 lb (about 240 pieces).

name: Jcoco Cayenne Veracruz Orange
intro: The Cayenne Veracruz Orange bar was inspired by a local delicacy from the Yucatan Peninsula - a fresh sliced orange with light dusting of chili powder. The sweetness of white chocolate (pure cocoa butter) is perfectly balanced by citrus and finished with a gentle kick of pepper that lingers long after the chocolate has disappeared. Includes three individually wrapped 1 oz bars.

name: Jcoco Black Fig Pistachio
intro: The black fig pistachio bar is made with dried black California mission figs and whole roasted California pistachios. The black figs are lusciously sweet and provide a complex texture that combines chewy flesh, smooth skin, and crunchy seeds. The pistachios add a light crunch and nutty complement to the fruit and dark chocolate. Includes three individually wrapped 1 oz bars.

name: Milk Chocolate Truffle
intro: Creamy milk chocolate...an old favorite. Available in 2.5 lb (about 120 pieces) and 5 lb (about 240 pieces).

name: Seattle Sea Salt Truffle Bar
intro: What BOOM tastes like! This all natural bar is a perfect blend of sweet and salty, boasting crunchy toffee and a dash of sea salt in decadent milk chocolate using Rainforest Alliance Certified™ cocoa. The Seattle Sea Salt bar is truly the chocolate bar of champions! 2.5 oz.

name: Pike Place Espresso Truffle Bar
intro: Dark chocolate infused with decaffeinated, deeply roasted and finely ground espresso. A Seattle tradition, much like its namesake. Now using 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified™ cocoa. 2.5 oz.

ingredients: Alcohol (91%), peppermint oil.
intro: Our pure peppermint extract is free of artificial colors and flavors because we make it from all-natural oils. Try it in your iced tea or add a refreshing peppermint flavor to desserts like chocolate cake, frosting, cookies, brownies, candies and fudge sauce.
name: Watkins Pure Peppermint Extract
Sonoma Syrup Co. Raspberry Simple Syrup
intro: Infused with all natural raspberry juice and a hint of Meyer lemon.
ingredients: Liquid cane sugar, cane sugar, water, raspberry juice concentrate, raspberry puree concentrate, meyer lemon concentrate, lemon extract, vitamin c (ascorbic acid), vanilla extract, citric acid, natural raspberry flavor, sea salt

name: Cherry Swizzle Sticks - Rock Your Drink
intro: Cherry flavored pure cane sugar stirring sticks-unwrapped.  Rock Your Drink with your favorite flavor stick-use as a garnish or eat like a pop

When it has to please even the most discerning recipient, then look no further than Shari's Berries. Each strawberry is individually dipped and swizzled then gently tucked into a protective gift box, waiting for you to enjoy.
name: Full Dozen Gourmet Dipped Swizzled Strawberries

intro: Our ColorBlock premium greaseproof solid baking cups add a bold pop of color to your party dessert table and can be coordinated with our other party supplies for a coordinated look. These exclusive cupcake liners will not fade and the colors and patterns will stay bright after baking - even with dark colored cakes. No more doubling up on liners before baking - saving you time and money!
name: Solid Cupcake Liners: Pink

intro: Our Sweets & Treats brand paper party straws add the perfect touch to an event whether it is for beverage sipping, dipped treat sticks, old fashioned pixie sticks, cupcake toppers or party decor! Pair with our other party supplies for a coordinated look. Each pack of paper straws are biodegradable, printed with food safe ink, and come packaged in a clear eco-friendly box perfect for storage or gift giving.
name: Dot Paper Straws: Red/White

intro: Our Sweets & Treats brand paper party straws add the perfect touch to an event whether it is for beverage sipping, dipped treat sticks, old fashioned pixie sticks, cupcake toppers or party decor! Pair with our other party supplies for a coordinated look. Each pack of paper straws are biodegradable, printed with food safe ink, and come packaged in a clear eco-friendly box perfect for storage or gift giving.
name: Dot Paper Straws: Pink/White

intro: Our Sweets & Treats brand paper party straws add the perfect touch to an event whether it is for beverage sipping, dipped treat sticks, old fashioned pixie sticks, cupcake toppers or party decor! Pair with our other party supplies for a coordinated look. Each pack of paper straws are biodegradable, printed with food safe ink, and come packaged in a clear eco-friendly box perfect for storage or gift giving.
name: Dot Paper Straws: Pink/Light Pink

intro: Our Sweets & Treats brand paper party straws add the perfect touch to an event whether it is for beverage sipping, dipped treat sticks, old fashioned pixie sticks, cupcake toppers or party decor! Pair with our other party supplies for a coordinated look. Each pack of paper straws are biodegradable, printed with food safe ink, and come packaged in a clear eco-friendly box perfect for storage or gift giving.
name: Stripe Paper Straws: Pink/Light Pink
Sonoma Syrup Co. Almond Extract
intro: This exclusive Sonoma Syrup blend of pure almond extract is the finest quality available. Unsurpassed with extra almond flavor, stong, creamy, sweet and nutty, this aromatic extract will create new taste sensations in all your culinary adventures.
ingredients: Oil of Bitter Almond, Water & Alcohol.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co.  Organic Vanilla Extract
intro: This exclusive blend of pure vanilla extract from the finest quality premium organic Madagascar Bourbon and Tahitian vanilla beans attains the highest desirable taste notes. Masterfully grown on plantations in the South Pacific and the Bourbon (Reunion) Islands, ripened on the vine, cured carefully and bought to California, this ‘Vanilla Panifola Andrews’ and ‘Vanilla Tahitensis’ with vanilla bean seeds will create new taste sensations in all of your culinary adventures.
ingredients: Organic Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla bean extractives in filtered water and organic alcohol

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Vanilla Bean Infused Simple Syrup
intro: Working with plantation owners and growers, we produce the finest quality premium Madagascar Bourbon and Tahitian vanilla beans, ripened on the vine and carefully cured for us. Blended like a fine wine, complete with vanilla bean seeds, the classic vanilla flavors and floral taste notes produce unsurpassed taste and aroma. Historically used as an aphrodisiac, the varietal Vanilla Infused Syrup reflects the terroir of each region creating a robust, floral and aromatic sweet vanilla vintage flavor.
ingredients: Pure cane sugar, filtered water, vanilla extract, citric acid, caramel, ascorbic acid (vitamin C), Madagascar Bourbon and Tahitian vanilla beans, sea salt.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. White Ginger Infused Simple Syrup
intro: One of the oldest of all culinary spices, Ginger, ‘zingiberaceae’ has been cultivated for over 2500 years. Ginger had been known to enhance circulation, impart warmth to the body, help digestion, inspire amour and have therapeutic and preventative powers. We infuse premium fresh White Ginger (young Spring Ginger) in pure cane syrup for a peppery and sweet taste.
ingredients: Cane sugar, filtered water, white ginger puree, citric acid, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), white ginger extract, vanilla extract, sea salt.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Lemon Lime Infused Simple Syrup
intro: Lemon Lime is a naturally sweet syrup made with our California Meyer lemon juice, Eureka lemon juice, Lime and Key Lime juice for a sunny citrus kick.
ingredients: Liquid Cane Sugar, Cane Sugar, Water, Lime Juice Concentrate, Lemon Juice Concentrate, Lemon Extract, Lime Extract, Key Lime Extract, Vitamin C (ascorbic acid), Meyer Lemon Concentrate, Citric Acid, Key Lime Concentrate, Vanilla Extract.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Mint Infused Simple Syrup
intro: Mint, mehtha spicata, is an ancient herb, going back to the beginnings of history. The greek athletes used mint as an after bath lotion; in the Middle Ages it was used as a cleansing agent, and later to purify drinking water. We infuse with fresh spearmint leaves to give you the true ‘only matched by nature / using the real stuff’ refreshing mint taste. The classic taste of spearmint was inspired by a large mint patch in our Sonoma Valley garden, capturing the flavor in a bottle, year round.
ingredients: Pure cane sugar, filtered water, spearmint leaves, spearmint extract, vitamin C (ascorbic acid).

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Lime Infused Simple Syrup
intro: Key-Lime, ‘Citrus Litifolia’, and Persian Lime, ‘Citrus aurantifolia’ combine for the perfect ‘Sweetened Lime Juice’ for sprightly cocktails and sodas. We blend the Californian Persian lime juice, lighter and tarter, and follow Florida Key Lime juice, smaller and sweeter, for the perfect citrus flavor. High in Vitamin C, limes were fed to British soldiers as a scurvy preventative. Enjoy the tartness of this fruit and the aroma of its zest to create a simple cocktail or beverage.
ingredients: Cane sugar, filtered water, lime juice concentrate, lime extract, Key lime concentrate, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), Key Lime extract, vanilla extract.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Meyer Lemon Infused Simple Syrup
intro: In 1908, Mr Meyer, sent by the U.S. to find new plant varieties unknown to the Western world, imported the first Meyer Lemon tree from China. The tree is believed to be a hybrid between citrus lemon, the lemon and citrus reticulate, the mandarin orange. To achieve true flavor, we use only fresh California Meyer Lemon juice and peel grown for us. Simply add to iced tea, lemonade, sparkling water or cocktails. Use over yogurt or fruit, or mix into BBQ sauces, vinaigrettes, marinades and glazes.
ingredients: Pure cane sugar, filtered water, Meyer Lemon peel and juice, natural lemon extract, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), citric acid, vanilla extract, sea salt.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Vanilla Bean Extract “Crush”
intro: This exclusive blend of pure vanilla extract from the finest quality premium Madagascar Bourbon and Tahitian vanilla beans attains the highest desirable taste notes. Masterfully grown on plantations in the South Pacific and the Bourbon (Reunion) Islands, ripened on the vine, cured carefully and bought to California, this ‘Vanilla Panifola Andrews’ and ‘Vanilla Tahitensis’ with vanilla bean seeds will create new taste sensations in all of your culinary adventures.
ingredients: Select Bourbon, Tahitian Vanilla Bean Extracts, Water, Vanilla Bean Seeds & Alcohol.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Pumpkin Pie Latte Infused Simple Syrup
intro: Pumpkin Pie Latte Syrup captures the spicy warmth of a fresh baked Pumpkin Pie. A blend of all natural pumpkin puree and premium spices adds a rich fall flavor to coffee drinks and desserts.  Simply pour into coffee or tea to make Pumpkin Latte’s, Mocha’s and Espresso drinks. Or Drizzle over Greek Yogurt, on oatmeal or Drizzle over ice cream.
ingredients: Liquid cane sugar, cane sugar, pumpkin puree, water, spices (ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, allspice), cinnamon extract, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), vanilla extract, citric acid, natural caramel, sea salt.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Pomegranate (Grenadine) Infused Simple Syrup
intro: The juice from the pomegranate is one of nature’s most perfect antioxidants. Unbelievably thick and deeply flavored, this natural grenadine is the perfect addition to cocktails, champagne, lemonade, chutneys, vinaigrettes, BBQ sauce, or marinades for lamb, pork, duck or chicken. Because our Grenadine has over 30% real juice, we call it ‘Pomegranate Syrup’.
ingredients: Pure Cane sugar, filtered water, pomegranate juice concentrate, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), vanilla extract, sea salt.

name: Moscow Mule Copper Mug
intro: This classic copper mug bursts with vintage charm. As essential to the recipe for a true Moscow Mule as vodka or ginger beer, this mug is also ideal for enjoying cool, refreshing drinks year round. The perfect drinking companion for hot summer afternoons, the traditional copper mug becomes chilly to the touch when filled with the iced beverage of your choice.

name: Dried Morel Mushrooms
intro: Few ingredients are more beloved or fleetingly available than morels. Dried morels reconstitute magnificently, and there are many French chefs who prefer them to fresh. Even a small amount of dried morels rehydrated, sautéed and incorporated into a sauce makes culinary magic. Steaks, chops, or pasta crowned with a luxurious morel sauce can be made anytime with these in your pantry. The small container is the equivalent of over a half a pound of fresh morels while the larger container equals two pounds fresh.

name: Dried Porcini #1
intro: Flavor-loaded dried porcini should be on every single pantry shelf.  Our dried porcini are picked and dried here in Northern California.  Having our large tube of dried porcini is the equivalent of always having over a pound of fresh porcini in the house. Their legendary rich flavor is just a 15 minute water or broth soak away. Once tender they are ready for a quick sauté and to be added to everything, from endless pasta sauces, to soups. Porcini will elevate something as simple as meatloaf into something extraordinary.

name: Dried Black Trumpet Mushrooms
intro: These are one of the least used and most wonderful of all dried mushrooms. They rehydrate very quickly. I love these layered between potatoes in a gratin and always over fish and pasta. Be sure to wash them before rehydrating, and then strain the liquid you used for rehydrating, just as you should with all dried mushrooms.

name: Dried Lobster Mushrooms
intro: Colorful lobster mushrooms are like no other wild mushroom. The flaming coral color (like lobster, red outside and white inside) and crustacean aroma are a fine firm-textured addition to pasta sauces, chowder and seafood dishes.

name: Dried Chanterelle Mushrooms
intro: Dried chanterelles are ideal for infusing chanterelle's lovely flavor into vodka, stocks, and sauces.  Dried chanterelles need to be chopped finely after rehydrating because they tend to be tougher than other dried mushrooms.

name: Dried Yellowfoot Mushrooms
intro: Dried yellow feet are rarely seen. We can keep it our little secret. This often neglected mushroom is wonderfully delicious. Like fresh yellow feet, it is especially good braised with meat. Yellow feet become a melting and silky mushroom sauce in the bottom of the braising pan. Rehydration of dried yellow feet takes only 5-10 minutes. One ounce of dried yellow feet equals nearly one pound of fresh.

name: Dried Grey Morel Mushrooms
intro: The rare grey morel is the most intensely flavored of all morel varieties.  The rich beefy flavor is extraordinary.  Grey morels are naturally larger in size that other morels. Few ingredients are more beloved or fleetingly available than morels.  Dried morels reconstitute magnificently and there are many French chefs who prefer them to fresh.  Even a small amount of dried morels rehydrated, sautéed and incorporated into a sauce makes culinary magic.   Steaks, chops, or pasta crowned with a luxurious morel sauce can be made anytime with these in your pantry. The small container is the equivalent of over a half a pound of fresh morels, while the larger container equals two pounds fresh.

name: Dried Mousseron Mushrooms "Fairy Rings"
intro: This is one of European's most popular mushrooms. More and more particularly clever American chefs have become quite smitten with these. The flavor is much like porcini, ,but with a touch of hazel flavor. There is SO MUCH flavor in a small amount of these. Since they tend to grow in sandy soil, rinse them two to three times in water before using. Like many other mushrooms, they are great with pasta, over meats, poultry and are excellent incorporated into meatballs.

name: Dried Candy Caps
intro: The intense maple flavor of this rare mushroom makes magic in creme brulee and baked goods as well as savory foods like winter squash or glazed duck.

name: Mushroom Alchemy
intro: All who try this elixir become quickly addicted.  Use this exquisite and complex mushroom pixie dust on everything from eggs to steaks and chops.  The umami properties of the various mushrooms within this powder add gusto to any flavor this powder touches. A tiny amount makes mountains of culinary magic.

name: Fennel Pollen Rub
intro: Here is complex and haunting stuff.  Our balanced blend of fennel and spice with subtle citrus notes can and should be used as a spice as well as a rub.  This seasoning is a classic enchantment for seafood, pork and a surprising enhancement for endless culinary adventures from bread to pizza.  I’ve come to love a little sprinkled on vegetables and salads.

name: Forest Farro
intro: This ancient grain’s nutty richness combined with wild porcini and organic shiitake mushrooms make our Forest Farro a healthy comfort food of the highest order. Abundant mushroom flavor with the toasty goodness of farro make this a deep, rich, robust dish. Our versatile creation becomes a remarkable risotto, a complex side dish, or a very hearty soup.

name: Porcini Salt
intro: Why use regular salt when you can get the immediate pleasure of salt with a blast of porcini?  Unlike the porcini powder that should be used with cooking, this salt adds the essence of porcini on finished food as well as being a welcome component in the cooking process.

name: Elderberry Jelly
intro: I can’t think of anyone who’s tasted this that doesn’t think that this is the best jelly there is.  The complex cassis-like flavor of wild elderberries makes other fruit jellies seem one dimensional.  A simple piece of toast with a little spread of this provides a lingering flavor joy. Beyond toast, it can do many things, from painting pound cake to glazing duck.  We carefully harvest these wild elderberries for you and still leave plenty on the trees for the birds too.

name: Juniper Berry Rub
intro: This wild juniper rub is also a most refreshing spice.  The delightful flavors we love in gin are a stunning enhancement for game, pork, salmon and choucroute.  This unusual spice can pioneer new flavors in your kitchen.

name: Candy Cap Sugar
intro: The mysterious maple flavor of the rare candy cap mushroom haunts the taste buds of all who have tasted it.  This sugar infused with candy caps also has a single mushroom hiding in the jar so you can see just what they look like.  It is one of the ultimate finishing touches for crème brulée. Use for many desserts or as the sweetener for hot toddies. A little sprinkle will make something as simple as oatmeal and French toast utterly fabulous.

name: Wild Huckleberry Shrub
intro: The nearly forgotten colonial shrub elixir is back in a big way these days. Our wild huckleberry shrub is loaded with the brambly richness of American huckleberries.  Mark Twain would have loved it. This delicious shrub/syrup makes a stunning soda pop, a stellar winter salad dressing ingredient, and always a secret weapon for making magical cocktails.  I often just go simple and pour it over French vanilla or even chocolate ice cream like a great aged balsamic vinegar.

name: Pickled Cocktail Chanterelles
intro: We went to great trouble to sort out the tiniest, most perfect button chanterelles for this luxurious bottle.  They will be the grandes dames of any charcuterie plate they grace.  My favorite use for these beauties is a single perfect chanterelle pickle plunked into a perfect martini.

name: Wild Elderberry Shrub
intro: The old elixir, a shrub, is made new again in this rich version brimming with wild elderberries. This delicious elderberry shrub is a culinary seasoning, a beverage, and even a medicinal adventure. The intense flavor can take you in diverse directions, from its traditional use as syrup in what we now think of as soda pop, to a magical ingredient for making cocktails, or even as a base for astounding salad dressings. Because of its concentrated flavor, a little goes a long way.

name: Native Wild Pecans
intro: Is there a soul that doesn’t love pecans?  Yet few know that it is one of America’s indigenous native foods. Part of the hickory clan, wild pecan trees are one of the most beautiful trees in our southern hardwood forests. Even the most knowledgeable foodies are usually ignorant of the extraordinary taste of these hard-shelled tiny wild pecans. Most of the world knows pecans as the big 1-1 1/2 inch golden nuts gracing the top of the beloved Southern Pecan Pie. Our little native pecans are less than half the size of the pecans you know. The flavor however is HUGE, the most concentrated pecan flavor you will ever taste. It is a joy to see chefs taste these and watch their eyes grow wide. Not only is the flavor stunning, but the tiny size of the halves creates an exceptionally pretty appearance wherever you use them.

name: Wild American Black Walnuts
intro: As far as I’m concerned, black walnuts are by far richest flavored of all nuts. If they weren’t such a colossal horror to shell, the food world would have wild black walnuts starring in dishes and desserts from stem to stern. But they ARE extremely difficult to shell and this fact has relegated them to obscurity in current times. Many of our more patient Grandparents however, revere them for the extraordinary culinary treasure they are. Their iron hard husks and complex interior structure make nut halves an impossibility. Being able to buy a pound of shelled black walnuts is a luxury you should not hesitate to grab.

name: Sonoma Syrup Co. Classic Simple Syrup
intro: An old classic made from pure cane sugar, water and a hint of vanilla that will blend easily into your favorite drink or recipe. First seen in the ‘First American Cookbook’ in 1796, simple syrup is a centuries old culinary ingredient. Simple Syrup is the most universal bar mixer and an essential ingredient for pastry chefs. Use to flavor and sweeten iced or hot tea, iced coffees, party cocktails, flips, frappes, fizzes and juleps. Use as a base for sorbet, lemonade or in a pastry.
ingredients: Liquid cane sugar, filtered water, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), vanilla extract.

name: Bellwether Crème Fraîche
intro: This Crème Fraîche is made at a family farm in Northern California. The Callahan's have been at the forefront of the Artisan cheese movement and their passion for producing high quality cheese products show in each batch they produce. They have created a traditional French cultured cream that is rich and tangy. It makes a fabulous addition to sauces, soups and the perfect accompaniment to caviar.

name: San Andreas by Bellwether
intro: A delicious table cheese made from raw free-roaming East Friesian sheep's milk, the San Andreas delivers a semi-soft texture, full-flavored smooth taste, with hints of citrus and a light berry finish. Bellwether Farms in Sonoma Countyuses pains-taking traditional methods to deliver a cheese that is perfect with aged Merlot, old-vine Zinfandel and crusty artisan bread.

name: Bellwether Farms Carmody Cheese
intro: Nestled in the rolling hills of Sonoma County, Bellwether Farm is a family-owned and operated dairy producing award-winning cheeses. Carmody is made from the milk of Jersey cows and aged a minimum of six weeks. Golden in color with a smooth texture and wonderful flavor.

name: Goat Milk Ricotta Cheese
intro: Our all natural Artisan Goat Milk Ricotta. Approximately 8 ounces.

name: Fresh Goat Cheese
intro: Enjoy our classic fresh goat cheese where ever you are with our new extended life packaging. 4oz in weight

name: Reduced Fat Fresh Goat Cheese
intro: Enjoy our classic reduced fat fresh goat cheese where ever you are with our new extended life packaging. 4oz in weight.

name: Triple Cream Disc
intro: This is our World Champion, a special, buttery cheese with a white edible rind. Smooth, rich and creamy with a hint of sweet grassiness. Slice on crusty bread with poached eggs ala sunny Hudson Valley countryside. Crowning glory for the dinner cheese plate. Our happy, free range goats are all natural, NO antibiotics and hormone free. Delivered direct from our Hudson Valley farm.

name: Goat's Milk Yogurt
intro: Made using only the freshest Grade A goat milk, live active cultures and natural flavors of honey, vanilla, strawberry and maple brown sugar, our Goat Milk Yogurt is made the natural way – fresh on the farm. With no added preservatives, you can expect just a deliciously thick, yet creamy Greek style yogurt. As an excellent alternative to cow’s milk yogurt, our Goat Milk Yogurt is good for you too. Each 6 ounce cup provides healthy probiotic cultures to support digestive health, 35% to 45% of your daily calcium and 12 to 15 grams of protein.

name: Honey Goat's Milk Yogurt
intro: Made using only the freshest Grade A goat milk, live active cultures and natural flavors of honey, vanilla, strawberry and maple brown sugar, our Goat Milk Yogurt is made the natural way – fresh on the farm. With no added preservatives, you can expect just a deliciously thick, yet creamy Greek style yogurt. As an excellent alternative to cow’s milk yogurt, our Goat Milk Yogurt is good for you too. Each 6 ounce cup provides healthy probiotic cultures to support digestive health, 35% to 45% of your daily calcium and 12 to 15 grams of protein.

name: Vanilla Goat's Milk Yogurt
intro: Made using only the freshest Grade A goat milk, live active cultures and natural flavors of honey, vanilla, strawberry and maple brown sugar, our Goat Milk Yogurt is made the natural way – fresh on the farm. With no added preservatives, you can expect just a deliciously thick, yet creamy Greek style yogurt. As an excellent alternative to cow’s milk yogurt, our Goat Milk Yogurt is good for you too. Each 6 ounce cup provides healthy probiotic cultures to support digestive health, 35% to 45% of your daily calcium and 12 to 15 grams of protein.

Ask a pear or walnut which cheese they prefer and they'll say, "One that's fruity, with hints of lightly roasted caramel, aged to crumbly perfection." In other words, our finest Parmesan. Which, in all modesty, is also America's most highly decorated Parmesan, thanks to the skill of our cheesemakers and the good taste of judges around the world. Salute.
name: Sarvecchio Parmesan Shredded

intro: Ask a pear or walnut which cheese they prefer and they'll say, "One that's fruity, with hints of lightly roasted caramel, aged to crumbly perfection." In other words, our finest Parmesan. Which, in all modesty, is also America's most highly decorated Parmesan, thanks to the skill of our cheesemakers and the good taste of judges around the world. Salute.
name: Sarvecchio Parmesan Wedge

intro: A Sartori-family original, this rich, creamy cheese with its nutty, fruity flavor is also - in all modesty - a celebrated gold-medal winner. Inspired by traditional, Italian farmstead cheese, BellaVitano® Gold begins in the mouth like a premium Parmesan and finishes in award-winning style with hints of melted butter. This is where our artisan cheesemaking first began to shine.
name: Bellavitano Gold

intro: An absorbing Sartori discovery: The sweet, nutty, fruity flavors of our most-sought-after BellaVitano® become even more desirable when blessed with a few prized drops of Modena balsamic vinegar. By gently bathing BellaVitano® Gold in balsamic, cheesemaker Mike Matucheski has given it a sweet coating that burnishes the legend of BellaVitano® with yet another honor from the World Cheese Awards.
name: Balsamic Bellavitano

intro: The fruit of the black pepper vine, used since antiquity in European cuisine, is present here again to accent our finest creation - rich, nutty, creamy BellaVitano®. By adding just the right pinch of cracked black peppercorns, we impart a spicy zestiness that's nothing to sneeze at. To the beautiful life!
name: Black Pepper Bellavitano

intro: By wedding this rich, creamy cheese to the berry and plum notes of Merlot, we've created a marriage of flavors destined to make your taste buds say, "I do." On that note, if you invite a few friends from our pairing guide - say, toasted walnuts, thin slices of prosciutto and semisweet chocolates for dessert - the honeymoon never has to end.
name: Merlot Bellavitano

intro: Like a finely tailored, pinstriped Italian suit, our blue-veined friend is always distinctive. Extra cream and indulgent aging are the secrets to this mild, rich cheese-lover's dream. Gorgonzola was first born in the town of the same name near Milan in 879 A.D. Perfected by Sartori in 2007, this award-winning "dolce latte," or sweet milk-style Gorgonzola, is especially silky and smooth.
name: Dolcina Gorgonzola

intro: Like a sartorially splendid Italian gentleman, this perfectly aged cheese grows only more elegant with the passage of time. We allow at least 12 months (to be more or less precise) for this handsome Asiago to achieve a creamy maturity. You'll welcome its distinctly nutty flavor and sense of old-world hospitality.
name: Extra-Aged Asiago

intro: Heralded as the "dew of the sea," Rosmarinus officinalis provides the perfect savory high note for this rich, nutty and fruity taste sensation. A gold-medal winner of the World Championship Cheese Contest, this extraordinary delight wears its laurels as lightly as the perfect balance of hand-rubbed rosemary and Italian olive oil.
name: Rosemary and Olive Oil Asiago

intro: By allowing a fine young Fontina to age twice as long as usual, we find our patience doubly rewarded with a rich, deep, creamy fruitiness that only grows sweeter with time. Thanks to our patron farmers and expert cheesemakers, this new Sartori flavor has already paired successfully with red grapes, walnuts and top honors at the World Cheese Awards.
name: Extra-Aged Fontina

intro: For the love of this lively Fontina, we enlist the earthy flavors of garlic, thyme and olive oil, warmed by the heat of Aleppo pepper, a spice named for the town on the ancient Silk Road. As you savor the sweet-smelling herbs mingling here with piquant cheese, you'll catch a sense of the culture that flourished beside Homer's wine-dark sea.
name: Mediterranean Fontina

intro: This savory triumvirate of zesty Parmesan, peppery Asiago and bold, piquant Romano, is guaranteed to turn your Caesar Salad into a salad fit for a king.
name: Regal Blend

intro: We're quietly grateful for the sweet, mellow, nutty flavor of this perfectly mature Sartori favorite. Because Parmesan accompanies so many foods so graciously, we offer ours in every form you could ask for. This way, "Will you please pass the Parmesan?" can always be answered in the affirmative.
name: Parmesan

intro: Sublimely sweet and smooth with a creamy, peppery finish, our Fontina is delightful by itself, and perfectly wonderful company when melted. In fact, when you see it as a golden-browned topping, or taste it in sauces and stuffed pasta fillings, it's often your willpower that does the melting.
name: Fontina

intro: This is a wonderfully mild and versatile grana-style cheese, justly famous for its nutty flavor, pungent aroma and creamy finish. You'll find it enhances just about everything from soup to nuts - including pizza, pasta, salads and flatbreads. Along with the judges at the 2009 World Cheese Awards, we say "Ahhh-siago" every chance we get.
name: Asiago

intro: Bold, savory, nutty flavor. Peppery aroma. Tangy finish. There - in a few short strokes, you have the distinctive kick of our classic Romano. With this award-winning cheese, a little grating is all you need to do. And of course, if you prefer, we'll gladly grate or shred it for you.
name: Romano

intro: This is our own nutty, creamy, award-winning creation - soaked with handcrafted Raspberry Tart ale. The bright notes of ruby-red raspberries combine with hazelnut and brown-butter flavors to make a deliciously complex cheese. "The beautiful life" never tasted so good.
name: Raspberry Bellavitano

intro: As a delicious treat for your breakfast or dessert, we hand-rub freshly roasted espresso into sweet, sugary BellaVitano® wheels aged to creamy perfection. We thank our artisan craft-roasting friends for getting up early to make the coffee - and helping us open the judges' eyes at the World Cheese Awards this year.
name: Espresso Bellavitano

intro: East meets west in this exotic pairing with the spiciness of Chai and our creamy and sweet BellaVitano®. Proof that delicious can bridge together any hemisphere.
name: Chai Bellavitano

intro: If you've ever seen how sweetly the town of San Gimignano sits atop its surroundings, you'll know how perfectly this fine mix of Parmesan and Fontina will grace even the simplest dish.
name: Tuscan Blend

intro: Like a new romance, this sweet, creamy and fruity cheese begins with a deliciously inviting appearance and finishes with a playful, tangy bite. It is named with deep affection for the gorgeous Dolomite mountains that tower with breathtaking beauty above the Sartori hometown of Valdastico, Italy. Prepare to fall in love.
name: Montamoré
American Cheese
intro: Made with Artificial Growth Hormone Free Cheese
ingredients: Cheese (Milk, Enzymes, Cheese Culture, Salt), Non Fat Dry Milk, Potassium Sorbate (preservative), Emulsifier, Salt, Citric Acid.

name: Baby Swiss Cheese
intro: Heini's "Traditional Baby Swiss". Some people say that it doesn't get any better than this. Weights are approximate and can vary, due to being hand-crafted.

name: Butter Cheese
intro: Heini's Butter Cheese. Some people say that it doesn't get any better than this.

name: Caraway Seed Cheese
intro: The flavor of fresh baked Rye Bread blended into a creamy mild cheese base. Great snacking cheese!

name: Chipotle Cheese
intro: Chipotle Pepper Process Cheese
ingredients: Cultured Milk, Water, Cream, Jalapeno Peppers, Red Jalapeno Peppers, Skim Milk, Sodium Phosphates, Chipotle Chili Pepper, Natural Flavor, Sorbic Acid(preservative), Annatto Color, Enzymes.

name: Colonial Cheddar Cheese
intro: Heini's very own "Colonial" style cheddar. Produced with 100% Amish Farm Milk.

name: Fiesta Jack Cheese
intro: Heini's creamy Marble Cheese loaded with plenty of chopped Jalapeno Peppers for a delicious, spicy treat!

name: Pepperoni Cheese
intro: Pepperoni Process Cheese
ingredients: Cheese (Milk, Enzymes, Cheese Culture, Salt, Annatto), Pepperoni (Pork, Beef, Salt, Spices, Dextrose, Lactic Acid Starter Culture, Oleo, Resin of Paprika, Flavorings, Sodium Nitrite, BHA, BHT, Citric Acid), Emulsifier, Potassium Sorbate (preservative).

name: Pimento Cheese
intro: Pimento Process Cheese. Made with Artificial Growth Hormone Free Cheese.
ingredients: Cheese (Milk, Enzymes, Cheese Culture, Salt, Annatto), Pimentos, Non Fat Dry Milk, Potassium Sorbate (preservative), Emulsifier, Salt, Citric Acid.

name: Pizza Cheese
intro: Pizza Process Cheese
Heini's traditional "Milled Cheddar" aged to perfection!
name: Sharp White Cheddar

intro: Heini's traditional "Milled Cheddar" aged to perfection!
name: Sharp Yellow Cheddar
Swiss & Rye Cheese
intro: Swiss & Rye Process Cheese. Made with Artificial Growth Hormone Free Cheese
ingredients: Cheese (Milk, Enzymes, Cheese Culture, Salt), Non Fat Dry Milk, Caraway Seed, Potassium Sorbate (preservative).

name: White Cheddar Cheese Curds
intro: 1lb of Heini's All Natural White Cheddar Cheese Curds!

name: Mozzarella Cheese
intro: Mozzarella Cheese
ingredients: Part-Skim Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes.

intro: Creamy and rich, our youngest selection presents the comforting flavor and broad appeal of an old-fashioned farmhouse cheddar. It's a smooth-melting cheese that's equally at home between slices of grilled artisan bread or served on a cheese board alongside a cold lager or German Riesling.
name: 1 Year Aged Cheddar - 1 lb wax block

intro: Our signature cheddar has earned national acclaim for its mellow tartness, creamy mouth feel and unforgettable individuality. Pair with a hoppy IPA, brown ale or full-bodied Merlot.
name: 2 Year Aged Cheddar 1lb wax block

intro: This outstanding cheddar has a pronounced, mature flavor, smooth finish, and a crumbly texture that makes aged cheese lovers sing. Enjoy with dark fruit jams or a glass of Cabernet, mead or porter.
name: 4 Year Aged Cheddar 1lb bar

intro: Cold-smoked over smoldering maple wood chips for up to four hours, our 100-day cheddar is transformed into a smooth,smoky delicacy that's both subtle and flavorful. Savor two of Vermont's signature flavors in one award-winning bite.
name: Maple Smoked Cheddar

intro: Vibrant, natural garlic infuses our smooth cheddar for a creamy, mildly pungent treat. We can't imagine a better macaroni and cheese than one made with this cheddar, which pairs nicely with wheat ales and Italian reds.
name: Garlic Cheddar

intro: Our cheddar is evenly seasoned with hand-rubbed Dalmation sage and natural sage oil, resulting in a fresh, herbal note that pairs naturally with aged cheddar. Slice it thin for a roast turkey sandwich with cranberry compote, or melt in a mushroom quiche.
name: Sage Cheddar

intro: This fresh creamy smooth cheese is a wonderful sandwich cheese and it goes well with crackers as a snack for yourself and your guests.
name: Monterey Jack

intro: This smooth textured fresh cheese is a wonderful addition to any Mexican dish. It has a nice creamy texture that makes for a great snack with crackers as well.
name: Queso Fresco

intro: This Finnish recipe cheese known as "bread cheese" is at it's best served warm. Be it lightly browned in a frying pan or broiled in your oven you are in for a treat. You can enjoy this as a wonderful treat or appetizer or as many have discovered as a great option in casseroles or other recipes. We provide ours in an untoasted form so you can enjoy the freshness instead of just rewarming it after it was previously baked.
name: Juustoleipa

intro: Aged at least four months, our Amber Sharp is a whole-milk sharp cheddar cheese in the american style orange color. With a delicious sharp flavor and excellent texture characteristics, this cheese is great for party trays or recipes.
name: Amber Sharp Cheddar
Organic Corn-Quinoa Supergrain Mac & Cheese - Mild Cheddar with Elbows
intro: If you think gluten-free quinoa mac and cheese can’t possibly taste as good as the real thing, get a fork-load of this. Our Supergrain Mac & Cheese™ Mild Cheddar with Elbows will have you spooning up seconds in no time.
ingredients: Gluten Free, Organic Pasta (Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour), Cheese Sauce Mix (Organic Whey, Organic Maltodextrin [from Corn], Organic Cheddar Cheese* [Pasteurized Organic Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Organic Corn Starch, Salt, Natural Flavors [from Milk], Sodium Phosphate, Organic Annatto Extract [Color]). *Dehydrated.

name: Organic Corn-Quinoa Supergrain Mac & Cheese - Mild Cheddar with Llamas
intro: Rich, cheesy flavor and playfully shaped pasta are what earn this gluten-free mac and cheese kid-approved status. But don’t worry. We’re fully supportive of adults enjoying our Supergrain Mac & Cheese™ Mild Cheddar with Llamas too.
ingredients: Gluten Free, Organic Pasta (Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour), Cheese Sauce Mix (Organic Whey, Organic Maltodextrin [from Corn], Organic Cheddar Cheese* [Pasteurized Organic Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Organic Corn Starch, Salt, Natural Flavors [from Milk], Sodium Phosphate, Organic Annatto Extract [Color]). *Dehydrated.

name: Organic Corn-Quinoa Supergrain Mac & Cheese - Sharp Cheddar with Shells
intro: You can thank our organic Supergrain Mac & Cheese™ Sharp Cheddar with Shells for your newfound gluten freedom. Made with gluten-free shells and the best cheese around, you’ll love this elevated version of the classic favorite.
ingredients: Gluten Free, Organic Pasta (Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour), Cheese Sauce Mix (Organic Maltodextrin [from Corn], Organic Whey, Organic Cheddar Cheese* [Pasteurized Organic Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Organic Corn Starch, Salt, Natural Flavors [from Milk], Sodium Phosphate, Organic Annatto Extract [Color], Citric Acid, Lactic Acid Powder [Lactic Acid, Calcium Lactate]). *Dehydrated.

name: Organic Gluten Free Pasta - Elbows
intro: When the words, “What’s for dinner?” start reverberating through your house, reach for a box of our Supergrain Pasta® Elbows. Great for making your own mac and cheese or a creative concoction for date night, this quinoa pasta has all the taste and texture you want with none of the gluten you don’t.
ingredients: Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour.

name: Organic Gluten Free Pasta - Linguine
intro: Feel like having Italian tonight? Now you can feast on all the saucy, satisfying, slurpable pasta dishes you love without any gluten worries. Our Supergrain Pasta® Linguine’s flavor and texture is so close to the real thing, you’ll totally forget it’s not.
ingredients: Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour.

name: Organic Gluten Free Pasta - Pagodas
intro: Enjoy a festival of color and flavor when you dive into a plate of this tri-color quinoa pasta. Our Supergrain Pasta® Garden Pagodas take gluten-free eating to delicious new heights, and their unusual shape makes them fun for kids and adults alike.
ingredients: Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour, Dried Organic Spinach, Dried Organic Beet and/or Organic Red Bell Pepper.

name: Traditional Organic Gluten Free Quinoa
intro: This is the grain that started it all. Our organic, whole grain Traditional Quinoa is everything you’re looking for in a meal and more. Complete, plant-based protein? Check. Great taste and texture? You bet. Gluten-free? But of course.
ingredients: Organic Whole Grain Quinoa.

name: Organic Gluten Free Polenta - Traditional
intro: Ancient Harvest polentas may be wheat-free, gluten-free, fat-free, nut-free, soy-free and dairy-free, but you can bet they’re always flavor-full. Try our sensational ready-to-eat Food Merchants Traditional Italian Polenta and see what we mean. Delicioso!
ingredients: Water, Organic Yellow Corn Meal, Salt, Tartaric Acid*, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Beta Carotene (Vitamin A) *A naturally occurring acid used to control pH.

name: Organic Gluten Free Pasta - Rotelle
intro: This quinoa pasta’s totally twisted (in a good way). You’ll love our gluten-free Supergrain Pasta® Rotelle for cooking up any meal imaginable. Make it the main course, use it in a casserole or sauce it up for a quick and easy side.
ingredients: Organic Corn Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour.

name: Oregon Blue Cheese
intro: Created nearly half a century ago, Oregon Blue cheese has been the West Coast’s exemplary, award-winning sustainable, raw cow milk blue cheese. Aged at least 90 days in our Roquefort modeled caves, it’s an approachable blue with a firm but buttery paste and a bouquet of flavors to satisfy a range of palettes. Bite into Oregon Blue and find a clean, briny flavor, notes of sweet cream and veins of mellow, earthy blue molds blooming throughout.

name: Smokey Blue Cheese
intro: A long, gentle cold-smoking over shells from Oregon hazelnuts infuses Rogue Creamery’s Smokey Blue cheese with an added layer of rich flavor and terroir. Sweet cream flavors and caramel notes balance earthy flavors of smoke and hints of roasted nuts. The result is a cakey yet smooth blue cheese reminiscent of candied bacon. Smokey Blue is the first of its kind in the world. Smokey Blue was inspired by a chef, and the flavor is signature to Oregon as the smoke is derived from Oregon hazelnut shells. Sweet, nutty, savory flavors envelope the sweet, rich milk creating a creme brulee with a hint of the toasted, sweet richness of a campfire.

name: Mt. Mazama Cheddar
intro: Mount Mazama is the epitome of umami. Made with a combination of cow and goats milks this cheddar showcases the best of both worlds: a thick texture, the flavor of sweet cream with a touch of tanginess from the cows, and caramel and nutty notes with a hint of acidity from the goats. The discovery of small crystals throughout the slightly crumbly paste will provide yet another level of textural variation and pleasure for the palette. Mount Mazama has incredible depth of flavor. It is rich and creamy, featured locally on a outstanding burger. The hint of goat milk in Mount Mazama gives it remarkable nuances as a standalone cheese and adds something extra in the kitchen.

name: TouVelle Original Cheese
intro: TouVelle is an American original cheese designed to please all palettes with full flavors of sweet cream, milk chocolate, roasted nuts, a hint of vanilla, and the slightest tang. The recipe for TouVelle combines techniques and cultures that are employed in making some of America’s favorite cheeses: Cheddar, Jack, and Gouda. Rogue Creamery cheese makers have created a new style of cheese using our cheddar making equipment. TouVelle shows off the buttery flavors of our milk where Cheddar highlights its creaminess. This semi-hard cow’s milk cheese is a workhorse in the kitchen because of its mild, yet full flavor, and it melts so thoroughly and evenly.

Where Cheddars are concerned, our multi-award winning Little Black Bomber is a modern classic. Our flagship cheese marries a delicious rich flavour with a smooth creaminess, lasting long on the palate but remaining demandingly moreish! Creamy & smooth extra mature Cheddar loved for its depth of flavour.
name: Black Bomber

intro: Green Thunder represents a real achievement in cheese-making that any cheese lover will appreciate – striking the perfect balance of complimentary but powerful flavours to create a singular, delicious savoury experience. Its perfectly balanced flavour allows the mature Cheddar, garlic & herbs to complement without taking over.
name: Green Thunder

intro: The smokey peat tones of Scotch whisky combine with the mouthwatering mature Cheddar to create the perfect ‘grown-up’ pairing. Ideal with a tipple at the end of the day or for moments of contemplation. A mature Cheddar warmed through with a generous splash of Whisky.
name: Amber Mist

intro: A recent addition to the range, and smartly dressed in vivid red wax, Red Storm boasts serious vintage credentials, aged for typically 18 months creating an intense flavour and refined texture. Sweet and surprisingly complex flavour-a vintage red with a crystalline nutty texture throughout
name: Red Storm

intro: It's the 14 carat diamond of butters - freshly churned creaminess bedazzled with Celtic sea salt. Starting with the freshest Vermont cream from St. Albans Cooperative, a co-op of 500 family farms in Northeast Vermont, the artisans at Vermont Creamery churn the cream in small batches into a rich European-style butter with 86% butterfat content and unique farm-fresh taste. It's perfection taken to a whole new level. Your morning toast is sure to say ''I do!''
name: Cultured Butter Basket

intro: To paraphrase Julia Child, a little butter makes life a lot better. We like to butter up our toast with butter from one of our favorite New England creameries, Vermont Creamery because we know their craftsmanship is top of the cream-line. While working on a dairy farm in Brittany, France, Vermont Creamery’s Allison Hooper learned a thing or two about churning cultured cream (crème fraiche) into thick, buttery butter. Churned in small batches, the cream transforms into a rich European-style butter with 86% butterfat and fresh off the farm taste. Cultured Butter is great for baking, pan searing meats, on your toast, and slathered all over...you get the idea. This butter’s like buttah.
name: Unsalted Butter Log

intro: To paraphrase Julia Child, a little butter makes life a lot better. We like to butter up our toast with butter from one of our favorite New England creameries, Vermont Creamery because we know their craftsmanship is top of the cream-line. While working on a dairy farm in Brittany, France, Vermont Creamery’s Allison Hooper learned a thing or two about churning cultured cream (crème fraiche) into thick, buttery butter. Churned in small batches, the cream transforms into a rich European-style butter with 86% butterfat and fresh off the farm taste. Cultured Butter is great for baking, pan searing meats, on your toast, and slathered all over...you get the idea. This butter’s like buttah.
name: Salted Butter Log

intro: Made using traditional methods learned while working on farms in France, Vermont Creamery's Allison Hooper brought her skills back to the US and crafted this exquisitely rich, creamy treat. Creme Fraiche can be used as an ingredient for sauces, pastry, custard, but also stands on its own as a topping on pie, fruits and soups.
name: Creme Fraiche

intro: Let that yogurt take a morning off, and give this a try. Fromage blanc is a fat-free, fresh and slightly drained cow's milk cheese that's thicker than yogurt, but has a zesty tang of its own that will brighten your morning. Serve with honey or strawberry jam, or whip into a fresh dip with dill, pepper and lemon.
name: Fromage Blanc

intro: German for ''fresh curd'', quark is a fresh and slightly drained cow's milk cheese that is similar to old-fashioned cream cheese. Quark is made from fresh milk that is coagulated overnight into curd, then drained in cheesecloth and whipped with a trace of creme fraiche. It has low butterfat content and smooth texture that make it a great yogurt stand-in with granola and fresh fruit.Three 8 ounce containers.
name: Quark

intro: A 25 year history and a slow, authentic process make this chevre stand out. First, milk is collected from small, local farms in Vermont. Fermentation is allowed to last a full 24 hours to make it incredibly creamy and another day's draining sets it to perfection. This time of year it has an extra fresh lemony flavor from the new growth of grass.
name: Plain Goat Log

intro: Mellow out why don’t-cha? We’re all for great sheep-y feta with its kicking hooves, but sometimes we go all-goat for a kinder, gentler flavor. Known for their award-winning chevres, Vermont Creamery applies traditional Greek feta-making methods into practice using 100% farm-fresh goats’ milk that results in soft, citrusy cheese. They use a lower-salt brine, which allows the mild goat flavor to shine its bright notes without overpowering its mellow creaminess. A truly versatile cheese, you can crumble in salads, use in savory baked dishes, or serve with pita for a simple afternoon delight. Crisp white wines pair best, or a dry rosé to help you find that mellow sweet spot.
name: Goat Feta

intro: This American original is named for its likeness to a snow-covered dome shape and is one of the creamery’s signature geotrichum rinded cheeses. In the landscape of cheese varieties, it stands out as a distinct goat cheese. Coupole is made with fresh pasteurized goats’ milk from family farms that has been coagulated and shaped. Coupole’s center has a dense texture and fresh, milk taste. Coupole’s allure is attributable to the intriguing contrast between the strong ripened flavor of the rind and the delicate fresh taste of its interior. The wrinkled coral-like appearance makes for an impressive centerpiece on any cheeseboard or melt on top of a perfectly grilled steak.
name: Coupole

intro: Cremont named for the “Cream of Vermont” is a mixed-milk cheese combining local fresh cows’ milk, goats’ milk and a hint of Vermont cream. This cheese is a true celebration of Vermont Creamery’s terroir. An American original crafted in the bucolic Green Mountains of Vermont that combines the nutty taste from of our crème fraîche, the creamy texture of our Bonne Bouche, and the wrinkled geotrichum rind of our Bijou.
name: Cremont
Hint of Mint
intro: It's difficult to make chocolate blush, but our mint knows just how to complement it – without all the fat and calories. It's the perfect guiltless pleasure whenever your sweet tooth strikes.
ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, WHEY PROTEIN CONCENTRATE (MILK), ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, CHICORY ROOT, SUGARCANE FIBER, DUTCH PROCESSED COCOA POWDER WITH ALKALI, GUAR GUM, XANTHAN GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, SEA SALT, MONK FRUIT CONCENTRATE.

name: Buttery Pecan
intro: Sweet Southern comfort. The same rich, buttery taste and crunchy pecan bits you grew up loving - without all the fat and calories. It's the perfect guiltless pleasure whenever your sweet tooth strikes.
ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, WHEY PROTEIN CONCENTRATE (MILK), ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, CHICORY ROOT, SUGARCANE FIBER, CANDIED PECANS (PECANS, CANE SUGAR, SALT), GUAR GUM, XANTHAM GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, SEA SALT, MONK FRUIT CONCENTRATE.

name: Cookie Dough Chip
intro: Delight in scrumptious chunks of cookie dough and chocolate chips in pure vanilla - without all the fat and calories. It's the perfect guiltless pleasure whenever your sweet tooth strikes.
ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, WHEY PROTEIN CONCENTRATE (MILK), ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, CHICORY ROOT, SUGARCANE FIBER, COOKIE DOUGH [UNBLEACHED ENRICHED FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), CANE SUGAR, BROWN CANE SUGAR, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), WATER, SEA SALT, VANILLA EXTRACT, SODIUM BICARBONATE (BAKING SODA), TAPIOCA FLOUR], DARK CHOCOLATE CHIPS (CANE SUGAR, CHOCOLATE LIQUEUR, COCOA BUTTER, ORGANIC VANILLA EXTRACT), GUAR GUM, XANTHAM GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, SEA SALT, MONK FRUIT CONCENTRATE.

name: Toasted coconut
intro: Our creamy, Toasted Coconut is pure tropical bliss – without all the fat and calories. It's perfect guiltless pleasure whenever your sweet tooth strikes.
ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, WHEY PROTEIN CONCENTRATE (MILK), ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, CHICORY ROOT, SUGARCANE FIBER, GUAR GUM, XANTHAN GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, ORGANIC DRIED COCONUT, SEA SALT, MONK FRUIT CONCENTRATE.

name: Orange Dream

name: Ice Cream Cake - Relationship George
Amalfi Lemon
intro: Sharp, refreshing, distinctly crisp. Captured within a thick, bright outer skin, the Amalfi Lemon sorbet is immediately memorable and eternally classic. Harvested during the months of March through June and grown within the Protected Geographic Indication land in Italy's famous Amalfi Coast, this iconic lemon has characterized its region through fragrance and beauty for over 2,000 years, as evident in the mosaic ruins of Pompeii. Each lemon sorbet is individually crafted and packaged in its original edible skin. A fitting capture of Amalfi luxury.
ingredients: Water, lemon pulp (19%), sugar, invert sugar.

name: Black Diamond Plum
intro: Soft, creamy, elegant, delicious. Hidden within a satin skin, the Black Diamond Plum reveals a gelato flavor disarmingly smooth. Picked in the first week of September in the town of Ottaviano, Italy, located in the foothills of Mt. Vesuvius, it is said that this Pappacona Plum was the favorite of summer resident and Roman emperor, Ottaviano Augustus Caesar. Each plum gelato is individually crafted and packaged in its original edible skin, casing this treat with noble respects.
ingredients: Plum pulp (62%), sugar, invert sugar, fresh milk, lemon juice.

name: Roman Kiwi
intro: Smooth, creamy yet pleasantly interrupted by the presence of delicate seeds. Beyond its unassuming outer skin, the Roman Kiwi challenges the senses through its exotic flavor and pale green speckled hue. Picked at the end of October just outside of Rome, the Hayward Kiwi is cultivated on Protected Geographical Indication volcanic soil and thrives under a warm Italian sun. So important to its region, the Festival of the Latina Kiwi is held each December to honor their treasured “green gold”. Each kiwi gelato is individually crafted and packaged in its original edible skin. A soft presentation of the unusual and exotic.

name: Ciaculli Tangerine
intro: Sweet, juicy, sharp, crisp. The Ciaculli Tangerine delivers a flavor unforgivingly bold. This Slow Food fruit is carefully produced in a designated region near Palermo, Sicily. Cultivated January through March on less than 200 acres, production is limited to those with experience and dedication and done so exclusively by hand since 750 B.C.E. Each tangerine sorbet is individually crafted and packaged in its original edible skin and served bursting with Sicilian fragrance and freshness.

name: Apulian Peach
intro: Sweet, innocent, delicate, fresh. Cradled in a tender, juicy outer skin, the Apulian Peach sorbet is as gentle on touch as it is crisp with taste. Picked in the summer months of June through October, this peach harvest offers a fruit so incredibly juicy and ripe it merely falls from its tree. During the second week of August, Canosa di Puglia's Percoca Peach Festival is celebrated as tribute to the town's prized “baby gold”. Each peach sorbet is individually crafted and packaged in its original edible skin, capturing its full summer flavor.
It’s not a brownie. It’s not a cookie. It’s a Chubbie. Three types of chocolate and two types of nuts (walnuts and pecans). These are chocolate nut heaven.
name: Chocolate Chubbies

intro: This combination of buttery cookie and fruity marmalade hand dipped into creamy Belgian chocolate makes for a sublime melt-in-your-mouth taste treat.
name: Chocolate Marmalade Cookies

intro: The heartshaped Linzer Cookie is Sarabeth’s version of the classic Austrian Linzer Torte transformed into a bite-sized morsel. Raspberry jam is sandwiched between the nutty dough that has a soft, yet chewy consistency. Ideal as a gift for Valentines Day and every day that you want to say “I love you” to that special person.
name: Linzer Cookies

intro: This exquisite cake is quite irresistible. A sour cream-based cake with a streusel of cocoa, cinnamon and walnuts, lightly crowned with white icing.
name: Budapest Bundt Cake Bakery

intro: Packed like triplets, our trio is even more dynamic now. It includes the Banana Cake, Poppyseed Pound Cake and Chocolate Cherry Cake.
name: Loaf Cake Trio

intro: Sarabeth has been serving her signature tomato Soup ever since she opened her first bakery/café. A visit to Sarabeth's is not complete without a bowl of velvety Cream of Tomato Soup. Now, at last, after 30 years, it is available for purchase. To duplicate the restaurant experience, top the soup with some grated light cheddar cheese. It is served exactly that way in every one of Sarabeth's restaurants to this day.
name: Legendary Velvety Cream of Tomato Soup
Ground Flaxseed - True Cold Milled Fine Texture

name: Flakes O' Gold - Coarse Texture Flaxseed

name: Organic Whole Golden Flaxseed
intro: Organic Premium Gold Whole Golden Flaxseed

name: Applewood Smoked Bacon
intro: You can actually see how lean Nueske's Bacon is...and you'll be amazed at how little it shrinks in your skillet. Its taste is unforgettable, too, because we smoke it a full 24 hours over glowing Applewood embers to give it that signature, smoky Nueske's flavor. Comes vacuum sealed, thick- or thin-sliced in handy 1 lb. packages.

name: Wild Cherrywood Smoked Bacon
intro: Naturally curred and smoked for 24 hours over glowing embers of fresh-cut Cherrywood logs, it delivers a flavor that's smoky, yet uniquely sweet and subtle. It's the perfect change of pace bacon for special breakfasts, culinary bacon creations and the most delicious BLT sandwiches you and your family have ever tasted. Thick-sliced (16/20 slices per pound), vacuum-sealed in convenient 12 oz. packs.

name: Spiral Sliced Bone-In Ham
intro: Here's the honey-glazed ham that was selected one of America's Best by Ladies Home Journal magazine. Our spiral slicing technique cuts down to, and around, the bone for ham slices so uniform your guests will think someone in your family is an expert ham carver. When warmed, this bone-in ham gives off a sweet, honey-laden fragrance that perfectly complements the unforgettable flavor of moist & tender Applewood-smoked meat. Fully cooked, spiral-sliced, ready to heat and serve.  Not a water-added product.

name: Old Fashioned Bone-In Ham
intro: Watch the eyes of family and friends light up when they see you carry this traditional, bone-in ham to the dinner table. It's skinless, shankless and fully cooked. Leisurely smoking over glowing Applewood embers gives this dining room favorite a delicate, sweet-smoky flavor that water-added supermarket hams can't come close to matching. Ready to warm, slice and serve for a truly delectable, old-fashioned ham dinner. In fact, there's an excellent chance your guests will say they've never tasted a more delicious ham.  Not a water-added product.

name: Boneless Turkey Breast
intro: Starting with turkeys especially bred for abundant white meat, these plump breasts are carefully boned and slowly smoked over glowing Applewood embers for 24 hours. The result is a moist & tender, completely boneless breast imbued with Nueske's sweet, yet smoky, signature flavor. The perfect choice to highlight of your memorable meal, buffet or party table. Available in three sizes to accommodate gatherings from intimate to large. Not a water-added product.

name: Smoked Bratwurst
intro: Fresh ground pork and beef kissed with the unique flavor of Wisconsin Applewood smoke, and wrapped in flavor-enhancing natural casings. These are the rare elements that make this Smoked Bratwurst taste like it's right out the Old World smokehouse of Nueske family ancestors. If you're a Bratwurst lover (or love someone who is), don't miss the experience of enjoying these. Fact is, there's a great chance these brats will set a new standard for flavor and quality at your house. Available is 2 lb. and 4 lb. packs; approximately 5 links per pound.

name: Cheddar Bratwurst
intro: You might think there's nothing we could do to improve on our classic Applewood-smoked Bratwurst. But, not so fast! You really need to experience this bratwurst enhanced with a generous infusion of genuine Cheddar cheese. Our Cheddar Brats are made from only the highest quality pork and beef, plus Cheddar cheese produced right here in Wisconsin. No binders or fillers... ever. Applewood-smoked and fully cooked, just a few minutes on the grill or stovetop and they're ready to serve.  Approximately 5 links per pound.
