Dominican 60% Dark Chocolate Bar
intro: Sweet and bright, this bar highlights the tantalizing fruity notes of our single origin Dominican cacao. Handcrafted in small batches, this bar is perfect for those who crave the complexity of dark chocolate without a bitter punch. Biodynamic vanilla bean adds subtle depth.
ingredients: 60% Dark Chocolate (Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, organic cocoa butter, organic vanilla beans). May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts

name: Cacao Puro Chocolate Mexicano
intro: The purest expression of our chocolate, made from only two ingredients: single origin Dominican cacao and organic cane sugar. We make Cacao Puro with Oaxacan stone mills, grinding the cacao twice - once by itself, then a second time with the sugar. This minimal process lends Cacao Puro its rustic stone ground texture and bright wine-like flavor.
ingredients: Organic cacao beans and organic cane sugar. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Cinnamon Chocolate Mexicano
intro: Cinnamon is the traditional partner to chocolate in Mexico. We grind whole cinnamon sticks together with organic Dominican cacao using Oaxacan stone mills. Our simple stone-ground process gives Taza Cinnamon Chocolate Mexicano its intense flavor and distinctive rustic texture. Makes a great Mexican hot chocolate.
ingredients: Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, and organic cinnamon. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Mexicano
intro: Whole organic vanilla pods from Villa Vanilla Spice Plantation in Costa Rica are ground together with single-origin Dominican cacao in vintage Oaxacan stone mills to make this sweet, fragrant chocolate. Stone grinding preserves the bright flavors of our premium ingredients and leaves an addictive rustic textures in the finished discs.
ingredients: Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, and organic vanilla bean. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Chipotle Chili Chocolate Mexicano
intro: Smoky chipotle chiles make a perfect counterpoint to the fruity, bittersweet intensity of our 70% Chocolate Mexicano. With the medium-hot tingle from the chiles and the rustic texture of our stone-milled dark chocolate, Chipotle Chocolate Mexicano is a feast for all the senses.
ingredients: Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, and chipotle chili powder. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Cacao Roasted Nibs
intro: Cacao nibs are small pieces of our organic roasted cacao beans. Our Roasted Cacao Nibs are toasty and rich, with an intense nutty flavor and a delicate crunch. They make a great, wholesome snack - all the cacao satisfaction of chocolate, but with no added sugar. Packaged in an environmentally friendly Biotre re-sealable pouch for convenient on-the-go snacking, or for topping your yogurt or oatmeal!
ingredients: Organic cacao beans. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Dominican 70% Dark Chocolate Bar
intro: Handcrafted in small batches from single origin Dominican cacao, this bar strikes the perfect balance of bitter with sweet. Bright red-berry notes blend with a hint of biodynamic vanilla, and stone refining leaves a subtle, intriguing texture in the bar. 100% USDA certified organic.
ingredients: 70% Dark Chocolate (Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, organic cocoa butter, organic vanilla beans). May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: 95% Wicked Dark Chocolate Bar
intro: This 95% Bar isn't just dark, it's Wicked Dark! If you're serious about dark chocolate, you'll love this barely-sweet bar that lets the intensely fruity flavor notes of our Dominican cacao shine, with almost no bitterness. If you're a fan of our 85% Super Dark Disc or our 87% bar, you have to try this!
ingredients: Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Bolivian 87% Dark Chocolate Bar
intro: This extra dark bar highlights the intense, nutty flavor of single origin Bolivian cacao, with just a hint of sweetness. It’s a must-try for serious dark chocolate aficionados, and for anyone who wants a satisfying chocolate fix with a minimum of sugar.
ingredients: 87% Dark Chocolate (Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar, organic vanilla bean). May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Chocolate Covered Nibs
intro: Taza Chocolate Covered Nibs are little pieces of roasted cacao bean enveloped in a thick layer of Taza Chocolate. We make them by hand in small batches using organic beans sourced directly from cacao growers. The combination of nutty, crunchy nib and fruity, rich chocolate makes for one seriously delicious snack. Taza Chocolate Covered Nibs are great for baking or topping ice cream too.
ingredients: Organic dark chocolate (roasted cacao beans, organic cane sugar, organic cocoa butter, organic vanilla bean), organic roasted cacao nibs. May contain traces of tree nuts and/or peanuts.

name: Salted Almond Chocolate Mexicano
intro: A mouthwatering balance of salty and sweet! We roast whole, raw almonds from Big Tree Organic Farms fresh in-house, then stone-grind them with our single origin Dominican cacao in traditional Oaxacan molinos. A finishing touch of salt makes Taza Salted Almond Mexicano completely irresistible.
ingredients: Organic cane sugar, organic cacao beans, organic almonds, salt. Contains tree nuts and may contain traces of peanuts.  - See more at: http://www.tazachocolate.com/store/Products/AlmMexDisc#sthash.CICwmNX4.dpuf
Black tea, cardamon
intro: This wonderfully warm and exotic black tea is reminiscent of Indian chai. Breathe in the eastern, spicy aroma and think of traveling to India one day. A popular wintertime beverage that is divine without milk, but is only enhanced when made as a chai latte.
name: Cardamon

ingredients: Green tea

intro: Oh-so-English and very posh, this best selling, Earl Grey blend is essential for High Tea. Be transported to the English countryside by the aroma of heavenly Bergamot. These Earl Grey tea bags are a mainstay in your tea cupboard. Reach for them when you crave this select blend of finest teas with it's particularly invigorating and refreshing citrus taste. Sip 'as is' or add a slice of lemon if so desired.

ingredients: Black tea with a slight touch of bergamot

And if that's not enough, a touch of Bergamot tickles the palette for the most English of brews. Bake a fresh batch of warm scones and sip and scoff the afternoon away. Add a slice of lemon to this tea, if preferred.
name: English Afternoon

ingredients: Black tea with cinnamon pieces
intro: For a soothing and spicy beverage enjoy this fine black tea flavored with warming cinnamon. Ideal for the holiday season and best served without milk.

ingredients: Black tea with raspberry fruit pieces
intro: This mouthwatering, raspberry flavored black tea is the perfect summer refreshment and the best reminder of summer in the cooler months. Enjoy this naturally sweet tea 'as is,' no need to add milk.
name: Raspberry Indulgence

ingredients: Hibiscus flower, Rosehip peel, Apple, Sweet blackberry leaves, Orange peel, Elderberries, Blueberries, Blackberries, Raspberries
intro: All the best English countryside berry flavors are combined into one delicious caffeine free infusion. Blueberry, raspberry, blackberry, and elderberry are blended with hibiscus for a natural pick-me-up day or night.

intro: The soothing flavor of fresh vanilla compliments this fine black tea perfectly. A relaxing cup that reminds you of all your favorite things. No need to add milk or sugar, unless it takes your fancy.

intro: Lemon and ginger are made for each other and no home should be without this delicious tisane. Enjoy it hot and you have yourself a summertime soother or a wintertime warmer. Add honey for sweetness if preferred.

intro: A delightful green tea blend, enhanced with mint leaves for an added accent. For an even more refreshing experience serve iced with fresh sprigs of mint. Add sugar or honey if you're looking for a sweet mint tea for summertime get togethers.
name: Mint Mystique
DECAF EVENING

Cooking Grade Matcha 100 gram bag
intro: Our Cooking Grade Matcha is specifically blended for culinary purposes. People often mistakenly believe that better or more expensive grades of Matcha are the best to use for Matcha-based recipes.  While true for drinking, this belief is not the case for cooking. A good cooking grade Matcha has a stronger tea flavor than a drinking grade.  This allows the Matcha flavor to shine though even if mixed with other ingredients. Although most would consider it slightly too strong for traditional drinking, this grade is best suited for making Matcha flavored desserts and beverages such as cookies, cakes, smoothies, and lattes.

name: Organic Cooking Grade Matcha 100 gram bag
intro: This USDS certified Organic Cooking Grade Matcha is specifically blended for culinary purposes. People often mistakenly believe that better or more expensive grades of Matcha are the best to use for Matcha-based recipes.  While true for drinking, this belief is not the case for cooking. A good cooking grade Matcha has a stronger tea flavor than a drinking grade.  This allows the Matcha flavor to shine though even if mixed with other ingredients. Although most would consider it slightly too strong for traditional drinking, this grade is best suited for making Matcha flavored desserts and beverages such as cookies, cakes, smoothies, and lattes.

name: Ceremonial Matcha 100 gram bag
intro: This Ceremonial Matcha is our most popular Matcha grade. It is high enough quality that it can be used for formal tea ceremony. This is why we call it “Ceremonial Grade”. Having the perfect balance of natural sweetness (derived from the amino acid L-theanine) and slight Matcha astringency (derived from natural tea Catechins), this is the perfect Usu-cha (thin style Matcha).

name: Matcha Zen Café Blend
intro: As the global population becomes more health conscious, drink makers have been looking for better alternatives to coffee based beverages.  Many have started using teas to fit the bill. As a result, more and more cafes now offer teas and tea-based smoothies or lattes. Many of these tea-based “healthy alternatives,” however, tend to not be all natural or contain too much sugar. Aiya's Matcha Zen Cafe Blend series is the perfect solution to this problem. Aiya's Zen Cafe Blend contains pure Matcha green tea powder and is only slightly sweetened with pure cane sugar, making it easy to create delicious green tea flavored drinks. Matcha green tea is unlike any other tea because you are actually consuming the whole tea leaf and receiving 100% of its nutritional benefits. That is the beauty of Matcha green tea; you can use it however you like while still receiving the full health benefits straight from the leaf. Our Matcha Zen Cafe Blend Sticks are the perfect single-serving option for those on the go.The new packaging for this product features easy-tear film and directions for use directly on each individual stick, making it easier than ever to make and enjoy Matcha Zen Cafe Blend, or even to share with friends!

name: Organic Sencha 80 grams Loose Leaf
intro: Organic Sencha is one of the highest in quality in the Japanese internationally certfied organic Sencha category. This grade of Organic Sencha is rare even in the Japanese market. This tea is grown to meet strict organic regulations while maintaining a light refreshing flavor and aroma with a clear green appearance.
ingredients: Organic Japanese Green Tea - Organic Sencha

name: Organic Matcha Infused Sencha 80 grams Loose Leaf
intro: Organic Matcha Infused Sencha is a blend of organic Japanese Sencha tea leaves and organic Matcha green tea, giving you the best of both worlds. The refreshing taste of Sencha is enhanced with the health-giving properties of organic Matcha green tea.
ingredients: Organic Japanese Green Tea, Organic Matcha Green Tea

name: Matcha Bowl Deep Soil
intro: This Bizen-style Matcha Bowl is crafted from iron rich soil, which enhances its durability. Since the bowl is also dishwasher safe, it is especially suitable for beginners. The earthy grey color of the bowl gives the Matcha an irresistible jade green color.

name: Matcha Bowl Pure White
intro: The pure white base of this Matcha bowl is brushed with a soft, feminine pink hue giving it a unique, calming quality. The contrast between the soft white bowl and vibrant green Matcha is a breathtaking sight.

name: Rooibos Zen Café Blend 180g bag
intro: Rooibos Tea - the "red tea" - is directly sourced from South Africa - where the best Rooibos is harvested. A supple tea known for low amounts of caffeine with sufficient amounts of antioxidants. Rooibos is a delicate gem with a rich flavor coupled with a bold aftertaste, and is now pre-blended for quick preparation on the go.

name: Orca Spice Sugar-Free Chai
intro: David Rio's original sugar-free chai is a rich and creamy mixture of black tea and premium spices and made with zero calorie, zero carbs Splenda®. It is delicately blended into a convenient mix that makes an excellent gift as well as a perfect daily cup. Simply mix with hot water or milk.
ingredients: creamer (coconut oil, maltodextrin, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), maltodextrin, black tea powder, natural spice blend, sucralose (Splenda®), natural flavors.

name: Tiger Spice Chai
intro: David Rio's signature and award winning chai is a rich and creamy mixture of black tea and premium spices, including cinnamon, cardamom, and clove. A percentage of profits from the sale of ALL David Rio Tiger Spice Chai® will be donated to the International Fund for Animal Welfare (www.ifaw.org). For more info, visit our Animal Welfare page.
ingredients: cane sugar, creamer (coconut oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), honey granules, black tea powder, natural spice blend, natural flavors

name: Elephant Vanilla Chai
intro: David Rio's very first chai recipe remains as popular as ever, and is a rich and creamy mixture of black tea and premium spices. This season, try a Salted Caramel Chai Latte with your favorite Salted Caramel Syrup, then simply mix with hot water or milk. It is delicately blended into a convenient mix that makes an excellent gift as well as a perfect daily cup.
ingredients: cane sugar, creamer (coconut oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), honey granules, black tea powder, vanilla, natural spice blend, natural flavors

name: Toucan Mango Chai
intro: David Rio's Toucan Mango chai is a creamy tropical mixture of mango, black tea and premium spices, like cinnamon and cardamom. Especially delicious and refreshing as an ice blended smoothie or iced chai, it is a convenient mix that makes an excellent summer cooler or hot chai daily cup. Simply mix with hot water or milk or blend with ice and milk.
ingredients: cane sugar, creamer (coconut oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), honey granules, natural flavors, black tea powder, natural spice blend

name: Tortoise Green Tea Chai
intro: David Rio's green tea chai is carefully balanced with the sharp taste of premium spices like cinnamon and cardamom, allowing the true flavor of green tea to shine through. It is delicately blended into a convenient mix that makes an excellent gift as well as a perfect daily cup. Simply mix with hot water or milk.
ingredients: cane sugar, creamer (coconut oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), honey granules, green tea powder, natural flavors, natural spice blend.

name: Cub Chai Microbrew Concentrate
intro: After many years of development and effort, David Rio launched its liquid chai concentrate, Cub Chai Microbrew, in October 2013. This boisterous progeny of our beloved Tiger Spice Chai® claimed its territory in California, where it was born and brewed. Combining a balance of quality black tea and complex notes of spices, this new microbrew chai concentrate brings bold and fiery flavors of fresh pressed ginger, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and black pepper. Cub Chai Microbrew can be prepared by adding 1 part milk (or milk substitute) to 1 part chai concentrate.
ingredients: Brewed organic black tea (filtered water, organic black tea powder, organic black tea leaves), cane sugar, organic spices (organic cinnamon, organic ginger, organic clove, organic cardamom, and organic black pepper), brown sugar, natural flavors, citric acid, and salt.

name: Maple Moose Chai
intro: David Rio's newest addition of chai, our Maple Moose chai, was inspired by our Maple-loving friends in the North, and is carefully crafted with a bold taste of premium spices, such as ginger, cardamom, and cloves, and incorporates the distinct aroma and flavor of real maple sugar. The cohesion between the balanced tea, spices, and touch of maple sugar, makes for a lingering after taste that can be enjoyed all year long. Simply add hot water or milk to this conveniently blended delicate mix.
ingredients: cane sugar, creamer (coconut oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate [a milk derivative], mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, soy lecithin), black tea powder, natural flavors, maple sugar (2%), and natural spice blend.

name: Power Chai Matcha (dairy-free)
intro: David Rio’s (only completely) dairy-free, vegan chai is craft blended with black tea and Japanese matcha. Its rich and bold taste is enlivened with the traditional flavors of real chai spices including ginger, clove, cinnamon, star anise and cardamom. Powered with antioxidants from the matcha teas, it is delicately blended into a convenient mix that makes an excellent gift as well as a perfect daily cup. Simply mix with milk or milk substitute.
ingredients: cane sugar, maltodextrin, black tea powder, natural spice blend, natural flavors, Japanese matcha (ceremonial green tea powder), salt

name: David Rio San Francisco Mug
intro: David Rio’s premium San Francisco mug was beautifully designed with our beloved home city in mind. This 14 oz. mug will make a perfect holiday gift set with a canister or packet of David Rio Chai or for the enjoyment of your daily chai rituals.

A proper brew. Pure and simple. To give our blend its refreshing flavour, strength and colour we use top quality Assam and African teas. In the tea trade we're renowned for paying more to get the pick of the crop. Our experts travel the world to find the people who grow the best teas, which we then blend together using our secret recipe to create a traditional, satisfying brew.
name: Yorkshire Red - 80 Tea Bags

intro: Forget peeling & crushing, simply replace one clove of garlic with one teaspoon of Very Lazy Garlic to save time in the kitchen.
name: The English Provender Co. Very Lazy Chopped Garlic

ingredients: Red Onions (29%), Sugar, Bramley Apples, White Wine Vinegar, Muscovado Sugar, Caramel Free Balsamic Vinegar of Modena (Wine Vinegar, Grape Must), Molasses, Organic Sea Salt, Dried Onion, Garlic Puree, Ginger Puree
intro: Rich and tangy. Delicious with just about anything. Spread on a smoked meat and cheddar sandwich or use as a dip to accompany crackers and brie.
name: The English Provender Co. Carmelized Red Onion Chutney

ingredients: Sugar, Bramley Apples, Tomatoes (19%), White Wine Vinegar, Roasted Tomatoes in Olive Oil (5.9%), Tomato Paste (3%), Sultanas (Glazed with Sunflower Oil), Dried Onion, Organic Sea Salt, Garlic Puree, Ginger Puree, Red Chilli Puree (0.38%)
intro: Sweet with a kick. The perfect accompaniment for grilled fish and steamed vegetables, or spread on toast for a tasty snack. Gluten-free and suitable for vegetarians.
name: The English Provender Co. Sweet Tomato & Chili Chutney

intro: A light and crumbly shortbread with that distinctive 'melt in the mouth' taste that everyone will love.
name: Dean's of Scotland Shortbread Fingers

intro: A naturally brewed, non-alcoholic product that contains a unique blend of the finest gingers, subtle botanical flavors, and natural spring water. Not too sweet on the palate and with a deep, long-lasting ginger character. Perfect in a Dark & Stormy or a Moscow Mule!
name: Fever-Tree Ginger Beer

intro: The first tonic water to be created with the sophisticated vodka drinker in mind, Fever-Tree's Mediterranean Tonic is crystal clear, with a daylight blue hue from the pure natural quinine. The mixer demonstrates aromas of thyme and fresh citrus with hints of rosemary. On the palate, it is delicate and floral; it has a soft bitterness of the quinine with a rounded elegance from the herbs and citrus. The highly carbonated tonic has small champagne-style bubbles, which help drinks hold their fizz for longer which means even more flavor.
name: Fever-Tree Mediterranean Tonic

intro: Bitter Lemon that is perfectly balanced to enhance the flavor of the great gins and finest vodkas. By blending real lemons, subtle botanical flavours, spring water and the highest quality quinine from the Fever-Tree, we have created a delicious, natural bitter lemon with an authentic clean and refreshing taste and aroma.
name: Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon

intro: By using a unique blend of natural gingers, subtle botanical flavors and spring water, we have created a drink with a distinctive ginger taste balanced by supportive citrus flavors and aromas.
name: Fever-Tree Ginger Ale
Pink & Black
intro: Fresh-brewed and ready to pour. This artisanal mixer, handcrafted in small batches is a blend of black tea, hibiscus, lemon peel, and splashed with strawberry and lemon juices. Just add your favorite liquor!
ingredients: A blend of darjeeling, hibiscus and lemon peel, with strawberry juice, lemon juice, agave, citric acid, ascorbic acid

name: The Classic
intro: Fresh-brewed and ready to pour. This artisanal mixer, handcrafted in small batches, is a blend of English Breakfast and lemon peel, with lemon juice and lime juice. Just add your favorite liquor!
ingredients: A blend of English Breakfast and lemon peel, lemon juice, lime juice, citric acid, ascorbic acid, agave.

name: Coco-Lada
intro: Fresh-brewed and ready to pour. This artisanal mixer, handcrafted in small batches is a blend of black tea, chai spices, coconut pieces and pineapple juice. Just add your favorite liquor!
ingredients: A blend of black tea, coconut, chai spices, agave, pineapple juice concentrate, coconut water, citric acid

name: Royal Breakfast
intro: We know you’ve sung it in the shower. “Oh, I just can’t wait to be king!” Now your wait is over. This sturdy, rich tea has a velvety finish that leaves you feeling like a king. And if the crown fits…
ingredients: English-style blended black tea
black tea, marigolds, raspberry & passion fruit flavoring, cornflowers, natural flavoring
intro: It may look robust, but this tea is light on its feet and has grabbed raspberry for a dance partner. If you need the energy of a black tea but want that fruity flavor, cut in and give this a whirl.
name: Passion Berry Jolt
Earl Grey De La Créme
intro: Our unique addition of vanilla and blue mallow flowers create a richer, creamier flavored version of an old favorite that would knock the Earl himself off his feet. A classic black tea rediscovered.
ingredients: black tea, vanilla flavoring, blue mallow blossoms, natural flavoring

name: Chai Love
intro: These invigorating spices meld together to form a cozy, sweetly spiced flavor that’s reminiscent of hot apple cider. It’s like a loving hug – warm, comforting, and energizing all at once!
ingredients: black tea, ginger root, cinnamon, cardamom, natural flavoring

name: Créme au Chocolat
intro: This rich, dark flavor draws strongly on those aromatic cocoa kernels and is a mature rendition of the hot chocolate you drank as a kid. One sip and you’ll never look at hot cocoa the same way again.
ingredients: black tea, chocolate chips, cocoa kernels, natural flavoring

name: Fruity Pebbles
intro: You know the feeling of summer sunshine washing over your face? You’ll feel the same sipping on this 2008 World Tea Champion. Floral, fruity scents precede a light, sweet taste of succulent summer fruit. It’s sunshine in a tin…or a pouch!
ingredients: green tea, white tea, papaya bits, pineapple bits, rose , strawberry bits

name: Gojiberry Superfruit
intro: What do you get when a mad scientist fuses cranberry and raspberry flavors together? Gojiberry! Succulant berry flavors meld together to form this exotic, palette cleansing tea complete with a whisper of lemon.
ingredients: green tea, gojiberries , lemon grass, pomegranate seeds, natural flavoring

name: Chinese Jasmine
intro: This tea brews to the beat of its own drum. Sweet and floral tastes march together to form an exotic parade of flavor. So, shine up the tuba and strike up the band! Chinese Jasmine is coming to town!
ingredients: Chinese green tea, jasmine flavoring

name: Matcha Powder
intro: Gotcha Matcha? What are you waiting for? Made up of all-natural cane sugar and a concentration of the finest ground green tea leaves, matcha contains countless amount of health benefits. Due to its fine powdered form, matcha is extremely versatile and always enjoyable no matter how you make it. Add it to a smoothie, shake it on top of your favorite meal, or just stir it up in some hot water.
ingredients: green tea, raw cane sugar

name: Strawberry Exotica
intro: Island pleasure with the exotic bright taste of strawberry, pineapple, and mango highlights. These flavorful sensations create a smooth white tea like no other. It’s a perfect harmony.
ingredients: white tea, papaya bits ,mango bits , strawberry pieces, pineapple bits , red currants, rose blossom leaves, jasmine blossoms, natural flavoring

name: Pomegranatopia
intro: Take a trip to Utopia with a quick sip of Pomegranatopia. The intoxicating scent and smooth taste are made possible thanks to a combination of pomegranate pieces, blueberries, and Chinese Pai mu tan white tea.
ingredients: white tea, blueberries, pomegranate arils, natural flavoring

name: Lemon Meringue Chamomile
intro: Fruity and floral intertwined in one cup. The hint of lemon behind the chamomile adds that honey sweet aroma that will be sure to relax the mind and soothe you from the inside out.
ingredients: chamomile, lemon myrtle leaf

name: Figgy Pop
intro: A soft mango flavor falls like autumn leaves into the deep, full bodied pile of apple and fig. This pop of fruit is capped off by a rich creamy finish. So go ahead and jump in: No raking required!
ingredients: mango pieces, fig pieces, apple bits, rosehips , hibiscus, natural flavoring

name: Citrus Sunburst
intro: Its glow is similar to the setting sun over an island paradise. Burning with colors of deep orange, thick reds, and bright yellows, this blend of safflower, mango, papaya, pomegranate arils, and apples will make you feel like your feet are in the sand and the beach island wind is in your hair.
ingredients: papaya bits, mango bits, apple pieces, hibiscus blossoms, orange slices, pomegranate arils , safflowers, natural flavoring

name: Pumpkin Patch
intro: The stinging nettle leaves, honey dew, and sunflower blossoms all come together on a rooibos base that makes for a smooth, earthy taste. Although this tea doesn’t actually contain pumpkin, its natural flavors and earthy aroma will bring you back to the fall days of searching your local patch for that perfect Halloween pumpkin.
ingredients: rooibos tea, honeydew cubes, stinging nettle leaves, sunflower blossoms, natural flavoring

name: Ginger Sweet Peach
intro: Sweet with a kick! This tea is like the neighborhood kid you wanted on your soccer team. Starting off with a swift kick of ginger and a spicy, play-to-win, peppercorn attitude, this tea is a flavor-forward player. With strong teammates of apple, orange, and honeydew, you can sit back, relax and taste sweet, peachy victory.
ingredients: ginger pieces, hibiscus blossoms, rosehips, peppercorns, honeydew melon, rose petals, orange blossoms, natural flavoring

name: Explosive Mango Maté
intro: Coffee fiend, meet your new best bud! Robust, roasted, and earthy flavors meet a light mango undertone creating a unique way to explode through that morning grog!
ingredients: roasted maté, rooibos, marigolds, mango pieces, ginseng root, natural flavoring

name: Red Rose Rooibos
intro: The delectable South African rooibos is now infused with fruity hints and a floral finish. Control your allergy symptoms with this smooth blend.
ingredients: rooibos, linden blossoms, rose petals, orange bits, lemon bits, natural flavoring

name: Cranberry Tang
intro: Cranberry tart meets orange zest. This tart and tangy explosion will liven up any day, whether you’re doing taxes or skydiving off the Sear’s Tower!
ingredients: rooibos, cranberries, orange peels, hibiscus, natural flavoring

name: Cape Town Chai
intro: Picture chai on the beach! A subtle splash of cinnamon hits your tongue before stronger waves of fruitiness wash over. You’re left to bask in the sun with a smooth, honey-like flavor that leaves you calm and refreshed – just like a vacation!
ingredients: rooibos, cinnamon, ginger roots, cardamom, natural flavoring

name: Flap Jack Oolong
intro: Craving pancakes? Boom! Satisfy that craving without batter ever touching a skillet. This aromatic tea brings back morning memories with the smell of homemade pancakes and the smooth, full-bodied taste of warm maple syrup. There’s brunch, brinner (breakfast for dinner), and now brany (breakfast anytime)!
ingredients: oolong tea, walnut pieces, maple syrup, natural flavoring (CONTAINS NUTS)

name: Plum Bliss
intro: Sometimes you just gotta use the kiss method: keep it simple, stupid. Enjoy the classic taste of oolong tea while spicing it up with subtle hints of currants and peppercorns.
ingredients: oolong tea, currants, redpep percorns, rosehips, safflowers, natural flavoring

name: Chinese Gunpowder
intro: A strong blend of Chinese green tea from the rolled Gunpowder pellets produced this exceptionally pungent tea suitable for tea lovers seeking a stronger taste.
ingredients: Chinese green tea, jasmine flavoring

name: Sencha On The Beach
intro: Everyone knows a smooth date woos with waltzing and long walks on the beach. Ladies and gentlemen, this tea wrote the Suave Date Handbook. A hint of lemon grass waltzes across your taste buds before the full, earthy taste transports you to watching the sunset over the water. And that’s just Date #1…
ingredients: green tea, lemon grass, pineapple bits, acerola cherries, sour cherry pieces,  safflowers, natural flavoring

name: Pumpkin Spice AromaCup
intro: Pumpkin Spice AromaCup 12 count

name: Sumatra Dark 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: Sumatra Dark Blend (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) From the remote reaches of Indonesia comes this full bodied, robust blend. Burnt almond notes mix with a smooth, smoky character that offers the drinker a rewarding brew. Dark Roast

name: Sumatra Dark 2.25oz. 36 ct
intro: Sumatra Dark Blend (36/2.25 oz. Packets Ground) From the remote reaches of Indonesia comes this full bodied, robust blend. Burnt almond notes mix with a smooth, smoky character that offers the drinker a rewarding brew. Dark Roast

name: French Roast 12oz. Ground
intro: French Roast Signature Blend (12 oz. Bag Ground) Born in the cafes of Europe. This blend, of 100% Arabica coffee beans are roasted dark to produce a coffee you’ll enjoy at home or office.This blend of 100% Arabica beans is roasted dark to bring out an intense smoky flavor and slightly sweet taste loved by so many. Full bodied, rich in flavor, medium to high in acidity. Dark Roast

name: French Roast 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: French Roast Signature Blend (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) Born in the cafes of Europe. This blend, of 100% Arabica coffee beans are roasted dark to produce a coffee you’ll enjoy at home or office. This blend of 100% Arabica beans is roasted dark to bring out an intense smoky flavor and slightly sweet taste loved by so many. Full bodied, rich in flavor, medium to high in acidity. Dark Roast

name: Rainforest Reserve Fair Trade Organic 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: Rain Forest Fair Trade Organic (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) As rich and complex as its namesake. We hand select from amongst the best organic beans and then carefully roast each to its peak flavor characteristics to offer you a smooth yet bold brew. Hints of Caramel in the finish. Medium Dark Roast

name: Espresso Roast 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: Copper Moon Espresso Bold (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) Our bold espresso blend has been created to offer the most complex and balanced flavor possible in an espresso. Heavy crema with a sweet floral presence, balanced with a rich note of chocolate and a complex, sweet taste that lingers on the palate. Dark Roast

name: Espresso Roast 12oz. Ground
intro: Copper Moon Espresso Bold (12 oz. Bag Ground) Our bold espresso blend has been created to offer the most complex and balanced flavor possible in an espresso. Heavy crema with a sweet floral presence, balanced with a rich note of chocolate and a complex, sweet taste that lingers on the palate. Dark Roast

name: Colombian 12oz. Ground
intro: Colombian Signature Blend (12oz. Bag Ground) Freshly roasted Colombian coffee beans are blended to produce a coffee you’ll be proud to serve in your home or office. Full bodied, rich in flavor, medium to high in acidity. Light Medium Roast

name: Guatemalan 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: Guatemalan Blend (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) Known for its ideal growing conditions and favorable climate, Guatemala produces some of the finest beans in the world. Rich and mild, this smooth cup leaves a pleasant nutty finish. Light Roast

name: Kenya 2 lb. Whole Bean
intro: Kenyan (2 lb. Bag Whole Bean) Copper Moon ensures you the best of this mighty land. Bold and chocolatey high notes mingle with an underlying hint of filberts leaving the drinker deeply satisfied. Medium Dark Roast

name: Colombia Supremo
intro: Full-bodied and extremely flavorful, this world famous varietal offers a consistently superlative cup. Tangy with a clean finish and understated sweetness.

name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
intro: Jamaican Blue Mountain beans revered for their incredible unique flavor are blended with carefully chosen Central American Arabica beans. The result is a perfectly balanced, buttery and delicate cup.

name: Kona Blend
intro: Pure Kona Coffee and Central American Arabica coffee beans are married to create a sweet and mellow cup.

name: Pure Hawaiian
intro: This brisk and creamy treat combines Macadamia and Honey for a unique experience.

name: Chocatal
intro: We combine our hand-selected, estate grown Arabica beans with natural cacao nibs from Africa and South America. Fresh, aromatic and full-bodied, Chocatal satisfies chocolate and coffee lovers alike. Distinctive and enjoyable any time.

name: Espresso
intro: Jeremiah’s version of this classic is roasted medium in the Northern Italian style to enhance its natural sweetness and bittersweet complexity.

name: Mocha Java
intro: Medium-bodied, earthy and rare. Premium Mochas, the most ancient Arabica varietal, are paired with estate-grown Javas. Our extraordinarily clean version of the famous blend is rich and chocolaty, brightly floral and exhilaratingly fresh.

name: Hazelnut
intro: This delightful coffee makes for an excellent mid-day treat. The richness of hazelnuts adds just enough flavor to remind you this is no regular coffee. Subtle enough, however, so the coffee backbone shines through.

name: Vanilla
intro: Two of the world’s most celebrated elemental flavors conspire to form an entirely new flavor sensation. Simple and elegant.

name: Breakfast Blend
intro: Complement the morning with this bright and lively roast of Arabica beans from Africa, Indonesia, Central and South America.

name: French Roast
intro: We dark-roast this blend of select Arabicas slowly, in the French tradition, for a cup that is deep, strong, and smooth, without the bitterness.

name: Italian
intro: Roasted dark to carefully match the smooth body of Central American and African coffees to create a bold flavor with notes of must and tobacco.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
intro: A blend of Sumatran and mellow South American Arabicas. An intriguing coffee with exquisite flavor and hints of spice. Pleasingly sweet.

name: Decaf Colombia Supremo
intro: Full-bodied and extremely flavorful, this world famous varietal offers a consistently superlative cup. Tangy with a clean finish and understated sweetness.

name: Decaf Espresso
intro: Jeremiah’s version of this classic is roasted medium in the Northern Italian style to enhance its natural sweetness and bittersweet complexity.

name: Decaf French Roast
intro: We dark-roast this blend of select Arabicas slowly, in the French tradition, for a cup that is deep, strong, and smooth, without the bitterness.

name: Organic Chocatal
intro: A unique blend of medium roasted Arabica coffee and organic cocoa nibs with a rich full flavor like no other.

name: Organic Espresso
intro: Soft yet rich, with a round body and sweet-smooth finish. Enjoy it brewed as well.

name: Organic Breakfast Blend
intro: This smooth, full-bodied roast is perfect for any time of day.

name: Organic French Roast
intro: We carefully blend certified organic estate Arabicas, and then roast them slowly until they reveal a smoky and dense character, for an unforgettable cup.

name: Organic Mocha Java Pure
intro: With the recent emergence of organic coffee from Ethiopia, we are now able to bring this classic rich and elegant blend to organic coffee drinkers. Roasted dark to bring out its naturally chocolate and spice tones.

The recipe for our Swedish roast comes from a picturesque coastal town in the far southeast of Sweden. The town dates back to the time of the Vikings and prides itself on ancient maritime history. Glowing candles, trays of rich saffron buns, and steaming coffee charmed every home. Savor the celebration with a cup of Café Svenska. The blend of beans gives it a full, vibrant, smooth body, a fragrant aroma, and a hint of chocolate. It is so smooth it demands cup after cup.
name: Café Svenska

intro: The recipe for our Italian roast comes from Southern Italy, near the town that gave birth to the poet Horatio who minted the phrase “Carpe Diem.” Seize the day with Café Italia. Perfect for espresso, filter coffee or French press. A beautiful, strong, and elegant coffee with an aroma that will engage you as a perfect wake-up call or dessert cup. The blend of beans gives Café Italia a creamy texture and a flavor burst that’s fruity, sweet, with traces of chocolate, and hidden in the mix, a touch of almond.
name: Café Italia

intro: The recipe for our French roast comes from the Bourgogne region in Central France, known for beautiful landscapes, amazing kitchens, and famous artists. The blend of beans in Café France gives it a floral aroma and a flavor that has wonderful chocolaty undertones, rich body, and a satin-smooth finish. A true French experience from a blend of five different beans sourced from plantations in Africa, India, and Central America.
name: Café France

intro: The recipe for our Dutch roast comes from the eastern part of Holland, a land of wonderful cheeses, beautiful flowers, and historic windmills. Experience the warm and cozy feeling of Holland, roasted with pride and excellence. It’s an elegant coffee with a smoothness that is nearly addictive. The blend of beans gives Café Holland a full, velvety body, deep aroma, and light acidity with a touch of fruit, nuts, and a hint of chocolate. A blend of five high-grown Arabica beans sourced from plantations in Central America, South America, and Africa.
name: Café Holland

intro: The recipe for Café Suisse comes from the town legend says William Tell called home. The story goes that the bailiff Gessler forced Tell in the 1300s to shoot an apple from his son’s head. The tale became an important symbol of Swiss will. Café Suisse is unique in every way. It instantly entices you, beginning with a unique sweet yet bitter aroma and ending with hints of chocolate and fruit. It is an expression of true Swiss tradition. A blend of four high-grown Arabica beans sourced from plantations in South America, Central America, and Asia.
name: Café Suisse

intro: A Milano style Italian espresso. Dense, bittersweet brew with a nice crema, intense and distinctive flavor profiles, and a persistent pleasant aftertaste. This blend is based on high quality Brazilian coffees, with a touch of aromatic Central American to add nutty and toasted bread notes to the cup, finished with an India Malobar for a pronounced crema.
name: Espresso
Sweet Tea Classic Black
intro: This refreshing delight has a base on black tea from Rainforest Alliance certified farms and is complemented by the naturally sweet herbs. The smooth, sweet flavor enhances the full-bodied, brisk character of black tea. Delicious hot or iced.
ingredients: black tea, hydrangea, stevia, blackberry leaves, licorice, lemon flavor

name: Republic Chai Full-Leaf
intro: Traveler's Tea - Rich imperial spices are combined with Northern Indian tea leaves to create a hearty, flavorful cup. Deliciously full-bodied when prepared traditionally (simmered with water, milk & honey).
ingredients: Cinnamon, Assam and Darjeeling black tea, orange peel, ginger, coriander, cardamom seed, star anise, cloves and black pepper

name: Chai Spice Honey for Tea
intro: This blend of cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, ginger and luscious premium white honey is inspired from the age-old chai recipes of India, Nepal and Tibet. This honey will add sweet, warm spiciness to any cup of tea.
ingredients: Grade A US and/or Canadian premium white honey, cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, clove

name: Hibiscus Pineapple Lychee Tea
intro: Luscious pineapple and delicately sweet lychee - a small, round, creamy white fruit native to China - both sing with the flavors of warm Asian islands. They harmonize beautifully with the natural flavor of Nigerian hibiscus.
ingredients: Hibiscus (flower), rosehips (fruit), apples (fruit), stevia (leaf) pineapple bits (fruit). Other Ingredients: Natural pineapple and lychee flavors

name: Agave Nectar
intro: This all-natural Agave Nectar is sustainable harvested by hand from live agave plants in central Mexico. The ideal sweetener for hot or iced tea - it pours and dissolves easily, does not crystallize and enhances tea without imparting additional flavor. It is a healthy alternative to other sweeteners because of its low glycemic index.
ingredients: Pure, USDA certified organic agave nectar

name: Emperor's 100% White Tea
intro: This China White Tea is revered for its unmatched subtlety, complexity and mellow, sweet notes. Emperors had this tea plucked from their secret gardens to share with visiting dignitaries who reveled in the airy fragrance and pure flavor.
ingredients: 100% White Tea

name: Hibiscus Blueberry Tea
intro: Tangy Nigerian hibiscus mingles with the lush, deep flavor of blueberries in this fragrant, floral blend. Sip and sigh as you revel in hints of berry and bright citrus flavors in the hibiscus. We've also added a touch of lively rosehips and sweet, juicy apples.
ingredients: Hibiscus (flower), rosehips (fruit), apple (fruit), stevia (leaf), blueberry bits (fruit). Other Ingredients: Natural blueberry flavor

name: Hibiscus Sangria Large Iced Tea
intro: A Ruby Refresher – Inspired by the traditional Spanish sangria, this delightful caffeine-free herbal blend infuses tangy, premium Nigerian hibiscus flowers with a bounty of fruit. Add ice and fresh, sliced fruit to create a ruby-hued, full-bodied refresher that will please any crowd. Each of the eight, large, unbleached tea pouches are perfectly portioned for making it easy to brew healthy, premium iced tea at home.
ingredients: Hibiscus, apple bits, sweet blackberry leaves, orange peel, natural orange, lemon, lime and strawberry flavors

name: Jasmine Jazz Green Full-Leaf
intro: Yin Hao Jasmine blossom tea is recognized as the finest in the world brewing a bright cup with clean, sharp flavors. Sweet China leaves are married with fragrant flowers seven times during the evening when the jasmine blossoms open.
ingredients: Rare Yin Hao green tea leaves and jasmine blossoms

name: Downton Abbey English Rose Tea
intro: This vibrant, ruby-red infusion of rose, raspberry and hibiscus has fruity, floral notes and a touch of sweetness. Inspired by traditional British desserts, this caffeine-free, luscious tea is perfect as an afternoon treat. Enjoy hot or cooled over a tall glass of ice.
ingredients: Nigerian hibiscus, rosehip peels, apples, stevia, natural raspberry, natural rose and vanilla flavors and rose petals

name: British Breakfast Black Tea
intro: The Perfect Cuppa - A robust blend of quality black leaves, hearty enough to make any Brit smile. A savory mixture of Indian, Ceylon and Kenyan leaves is great with a splash of milk.
ingredients: Fine black tea from Assam, Ceylon, Darjeeling and Africa

name: 100% Organic Double Green Matcha Tea
intro: We've married the exquisite organic green tea powder known as matcha with fine, organic green leaf tea. We invite you to sip the fresh, springtime-grassy flavor of this tea. This tea's smooth character makes it a good partner with sweet or savory foods. Organic Double Green Matcha Tea was featured in Men's Health as one of the Top 125 Foods for Men.
ingredients: Fine 100% organic China green tea and organic Japanese matcha
Organic Rooibos (leaf), Orange (peel), Carob (pod), Cinnamon (bark) Gymnema (leaf) Banaba (leaf) Extract. Other Ingredients: Natural Orange Flavor.
intro: Herb Tea for Weight Control - Losing weight is all about moderation, expending energy, curbing sugar cravings, and being well. That's why, if you're thinking thin, this caffeine-free blend is for you. Based on health-promoting, organic rooibos, it includes tropical banaba leaf, cinnamon and carob which satisfy the appetite, assisting craving control*. Carob and gymnema leaves help to tame your sweet tooth and the urge to indulge.
name: Get Lost - No. 6 Herb Tea for Weight Control
Ginger Peach Black Tea
intro: Longevity Tea - This best-selling tea offers the sweet lushness of a fancy peach seasoned with the tingle of spicy ginger. Exceptional over ice. Voted Outstanding Beverage by the National Association of Specialty Food Trade.
ingredients: Fine black tea, natural peach flavor and ginger

name: Caramel Vanilla Cuppa Cake Tea
intro: Taste the decadent flavors of old-fashioned Southern yellow cake with homemade caramel vanilla frosting. Our smooth premium black tea blend is a favorite and was inspired by the caramel cake in the movie "The Help." This calorie-free treat is wonderful either served hot or cool.
ingredients: Black tea, sweet blackberry leaves, carob bits, natural caramel and vanilla flavor

name: Earl Greyer Black Tea
intro: More of a Good Thing Tea - Our exceptional Earl Greyer blend combines the lush flavor and exquisite fragrance of the Bergamot Orange, native to Southern Italy, with a lovely Ceylon black tea leaf from Sri Lanka. Recognized as the best tasting Earl Grey available.
ingredients: Fine black tea and natural bergamot oil

name: Cardamon Cinnamon Herbal Tea
intro: Warm the Heart Herb Tea - Native to the shadier regions of India & Ceylon, cardamom has a gentle, airy taste of the forest itself - reminiscent of ginger with a pinch of pine. Cinnamon brings a spicy depth. Also, great over ice! Cardamon Cinnamon Tea was featured in Dr. Oz: The Good Life Magazine as one of Dr. Oz's favorite items for travel.
ingredients: Cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, carob, chicory, black pepper, Chinese star anise, cloves and cassia oil

name: Honey Ginseng Green Tea
intro: A relaxing blend combines the ancient health properties of China green tea with Panax ginseng and full blossom honey. This delicious, subtly sweet tea offers a peaceful sipping experience.
ingredients: China green tea, linden flowers, pollen eleuthero, Panax ginseng, natural flavor

name: Natural Hibiscus Tea
intro: Ruby red hibiscus shines brightly in this evocatively fruity herbal tea from Nigeria. Sip the pure effervescence of hibiscus. Its crisp, bold juiciness stands out hot or iced. Evokes the thought of a perfect summer day in the tropics.
ingredients: Hibiscus (flower), sweet blackberry (leaf), stevia (leaf)

name: Peppermint Cuppa Chocolate Tea
intro: This cuppa is your gateway to guilt-free indulgence. A joyous chorus of creamy, cool peppermint, rich chocolate and smooth, caffeine-free rooibos will make you sing throughout the day. Relish in the calorie-free, healthful pleasure.
ingredients: rooibos, carob, cocoa kernals, peppermint leaves, sweet blackberry leaves, mint flavoring, chocolate flavoring & vanilla flavoring
Organic Rooibos (leaf), Orange (peel), Spearmint (leaf), Chamomile (flower), Passionflower (herb), Stevia (leaf), Valerian Root Extract.
intro: Herb Tea for Rest - Say goodnight to tossing and turning. Brew a pot of our caffeine-free herbal blend and breathe a sigh of sweet relief as the bouquet of organic rooibos, soothing chamomile, passionflower and the mellowing properties of valerian gently lulls you toward blissful effects*. Valerian won't interfere with REM sleep, so you won't have to contend with the morning hangover that often results from sleep-aids.
name: Get Some zzz's - No. 5 Herb Tea for Rest
Dandelion SuperHerb Tea
intro: While this small, yellow flower dots meadows around the world, its roots are known as a powerhouse of healthy benefits. This certified organic Dandelion SuperHerb® Tea has a reputation as a natural aid to digestion. This caffeine-free herb is traced back to the 10th century when Arabian physicians used it to treat their patients with its cleansing properties. We ground some of the roasted root (the powder that comes out of the tea bag) and added French vanilla to create a deep, full-bodied flavor, making it a nice alternative to coffee. Simply steep, sip and feel your best.
ingredients: organic roasted dandelion root, organic ground roasted dandelion root, organic vanilla flavor, natural French vanilla flavor

name: Cranberry Blood Orange Black Tea
intro: Tart-Sweet, fruitful blend of cranberries, black tea, and orange peels.
ingredients: Fair Trade Certified fine black tea, natural cranberry flavor, orange peels, natural blood orange flavor and cranberry bits

name: Vanilla Almond Black Tea
intro: Sweeten The Mind Tea - The smoothness of Madagascar vanilla beans takes over the first sip of this tea, sweetening the cup. Nutty almond follows, which sends it soaring to the realm of dessert. Try a strong brew with steamed milk for a tea latte.
ingredients: Fine black tea, natural vanilla and almond flavors, vanilla beans and almond bits CONTAINS ALMONDS

name: Milk Oolong Full-Leaf
intro: Cup of Abundance - This delightful, hand-processed green oolong is grown high in the Fujian mountains in China. Famous for its “milky” taste and silky texture, the large, tightly-rolled leaves have the alluring fragrance of sweet cream and pineapple. The flavor is smooth with light, orchid notes. Great for multiple infusions. 2011 Gourmet Product Award Gold Winner. 2012 Vegetarian Times 2012 Foodie Award Nominee.
ingredients: Finest Milk Oolong tea leaves from the Fujian province

name: Moroccan Mint Green Full-Leaf
intro: Tea of Good Health - Cool and refreshing, this brew is traditionally sipped from glass teacups with an overindulgence of sugar. Fragrant gunpowder and refreshing mint brews a soothing cup.
ingredients: Finest Formosan gunpowder green tea leaves and peppermint

name: Jasmine Pearls Full-Leaf
intro: Tea of Integrity - Harvested in early spring in Fujian province in China, the choicest, tippy leaf and bud sets are hand rolled into tight “pearls” and dried before they are scented multiple times with fresh jasmine blossoms. This painstaking process depends on perfect timing. The result is a clean, floral tea that yields distinct flavor even after many infusions.
ingredients: Finest grade green tea leaves infused with the scent of sweet jasmine flowers

name: Matcha
intro: This shade-grown tea from the tencha leaf is deveined then stone ground into a fine powder. This bright green powder is whipped into water that is heated to just before boiling resulting in a smooth, vegetal sweetness with no astringency.
ingredients: Japanese matcha powder ground from the finest Japanese green tea leaves.

name: Organic Matcha Powder
intro: This organic matcha powder is ground from fine Japanese green tea leaves. It is the star of the centuries-old tea ceremony. Once prepared, it is consumed in its entirety
ingredients: organic Japanese matcha green tea powder

name: Tropical Black Iced Tea
intro: We started with a caffeinated South Indian black tea blend, then added papaya, mango, pineapple, and coconut pieces mixed with red safflower petals until we had the tropics. This aromatic, full-bodied, brisk tea pairs perfectly with nearly any fresh fruit you choose.

name: Hibiscus Pomegranate Iced Tea
intro: Opposites really do attract with this full-flavored blend of tangy hibiscus flowers and pomegranate, sweet apple and cherry. A favorite with all age groups, this incredible caffeine-free iced tea brews to a deep red hue that is impossible to resist. Oh, and we’ve heard fresh lime juice and honey take it to a whole new level.

name: Spring Green Iced Tea
intro: This pure Chinese Sencha green tea brews to a crisp, clean flavor that is almost sublime. Brewed in hot (but not boiling) water, the delicately steamed flat green tea leaves give you a refined and subtle experience that proves a whisper can be as powerful as a shout. With the TAKEYA Iced Tea Maker, you’re just minutes from start to sip.

name: Enchanted Black Iced Tea
intro: Grown in the famous Assam tea region of Northeast India, this black tea has a familiar brisk and smooth flavor at first. The magic happens a moment later when you taste the fruit and honey coming through. The perfect blend for sweet tea or an iced latte. With the TAKEYA Iced Tea Maker, you’re just minutes from start to sip.

name: Mintopia Green Iced Tea
intro: Let your taste buds decide. We think this rollicking, refreshing blend of hand-rolled gunpowder green tea and naturally sweet spearmint and peppermint proves the point. By the way, it’s called “gunpowder” tea because the leaves look like shotgun pellets. Watch them slowly unfurl to reveal a full-bodied, slightly smoky flavor when brewed.

name: Coconut Vibe Iced Tea
intro: Visit the lush islands of the tropics without ever leaving home. This smooth Green Rooibos caffeine-free blend features rich coconut, papaya, pineapple, and lime peel for a truly tantalizing flavor. Each T-PAC™ contains premium loose leaves harvested in South Africa, pre-measured to eliminate the guesswork. Just brew, chill and enjoy the island vibe!

For compact storage or on-the-go lifestyles, this is your choice. Our FLASH CHILL 1QT Iced Tea Maker features the patented FLASH CHILL method, which chills freshly brewed tea in seconds, locking in freshness, flavor and nutrients at its peak, delivering the perfect glass of iced tea.
name: Flash Chill 1QT Iced Tea Maker

intro: Our FLASH CHILL 2QT Iced Tea Maker features the patented FLASH CHILL method, which chills freshly brewed tea in seconds, locking in freshness, flavor and nutrients at its peak, delivering the perfect glass of iced tea.
name: Flash Chill 2QT Iced Tea Maker

This is your ticket into the world of incredible TAKEYA iced tea recipes and creations.

intro: Yuba City grown and dried Sweet Pitted French Prunes, aka Dried Plums. Answer to the big question: All prunes are plums, but not all plums are prunes. Prune plums varieties have very high sugar contents that enable them to be dried without fermenting while still containing the pits. Dried Prunes are a great convenient nutritious snack. High in fiber, both soluble and insoluble, as well as potassium, iron, and Vitamin A.

One ounce of almonds contains 12 percent of your daily allowance of protein, absolutely no cholesterol, and you also get 35 percent of your daily allowance of vitamin E. Most of the fat in almonds is monounsaturated, also known as the "good" fat. This little nut is also loaded with minerals like magnesium, phosphorus and zinc, as well as lots of healthy fiber. And don't forget calcium and folic acid - they're in there too!

name: Fusilloni Pasta
intro: Artfully crafted by master pasta makers in the Dolomite region of Italy, this premium organic pasta is made from a rich, local variety of durum wheat called Matt. It is also bronze cut and dried at a lower temperature for a longer period of time to preserve the flavor of the wheat. Bronze cut pastas are also a rougher, more porous pasta that hold sauces and seasonings better and have a more textured mouth feel. Swelling two times its original size when cooked, Fusilloni's unique corkscrew shape and texture pairs well with any kind of sauce and is ideal for cold pasta salads.
ingredients: Organic Durum Wheat Semolina "Matt" Variety, Water Contains: Gluten, Wheat
