APPLE, MAPLE & SAGE: Boneless Skinless Chicken, Water, Dried Apples, Maple Sugar, Kosher Salt, Spices, Cider Vinegar, Sage, Natural Flavor, Lamb Casing. APPLE & GOUDA CHEESE: Boneless Skinless Chicken, Apples, Smoked Gouda Cheese(cultured pasteurized milk, salt, enzymes, cream water, whey), Kosher Salt, Water, Turbinado Sugar, Spices, Natural Flavor, Lamb Casing.

name: Smoked Pacific Salmon
intro: Freshly caught from the Pacific Northwest where some of the best salmon in the world comes from. Vacuum packed in natural oils, it makes a great appetizer or you can mix it with cream cheese to make a delicious topping for bagels or add it to a quiche or omelet. It's versatile, convenient and delicious all in one!

name: Maine Crab Cakes
intro: Delicious Maine crab fills these tasty crab cakes which are 80% crab meat combined with Dijon mustard, red pepper, parsley, chives and crunchy panko bread crumbs. Maine crab is known for its sweet, delicate flavor and these crab cakes make for a delicious quick meal. Serve on a bed of lettuce ad your favorite sauce or a spritz of lemon.
ingredients: Crab, egg, panko bread crumbs (wheat flour, water, yeast, dextrose, salt), mayonnaise (soybean oil,whole eggs, vinegar, water, egg yolks, salt, dextrose, sugar, lemon juice, calcium disodium EDTA), Dijon mustard(water, mustard seed, mustard flour, vinegar, salt, white wine, citric acid, tartaric acid, turmeric, spices), salt,black pepper, cayenne parsley, chives. Contains: Shellfish (crab), egg, wheat, soy. Made in a facility that also processes fish, soy, egg and tree nuts. May contain shell fragments.

name: Lobster Bisque
intro: Freshly caught Maine lobster fills this silky smooth and delicious traditional Maine Lobster Bisque. Made with cream, lobster stock, butter and subtle spices, for an authentic Maine bisque. Ships frozen right to your door, so no matter where you are located you can enjoy sweeet tatsing Maine lobster.
ingredients: Lobster, shrimp, heavy cream, milk, butter, water, white wine, modified food starch, sugar, black pepper, paprika, lobster base (cooked lobster, salt, maltodextrin, tomato paste, autolyzed yeast extract, corn syrup solids, salt, citric acid, cod liver oil, butter, dried sweet whey, onion powder, dextrose, oleoresin paprika, flavorings), shrimp base (cooked shrimp, salt, hydrolyzed corn protein, shrimp powder, natural flavor, sugar, clarified butter oil, potato flour, disodium inosinate, soy lecithin, extractive of paprika). Contains: shellfish, milk, soy. Made in a facility that uses: egg, wheat, tree nuts, peanuts.

name: Salsa Verde
intro: The tomatillo, is as alluring as an illuminated paper lantern; beholding a spherically green tomato hidden behind its paper thin husk, a distinct, yet welcoming collaboration of tart sweetness. This green tomato is the main ingredient in Stonewall Kitchen Salsa Verde, based on a traditional Mexican recipe that blends cilantro with a hint of chili to a tomatillo base. It is a wonderful accompaniment to all grilled meats, fish and poultry, and we especially love it served with enchiladas.
ingredients: Tomatillo, Chili Peppers, Onion, Serrano Pepper Puree (Serrano pepper, water, citric acid), Jalapenos, Garlic, Cilantro, Salt, Canola Oil, Lime Juice Concentrate, Spices.

name: Mango Lime Salsa
intro: With a zesty kick, this salsa is best with fresh, crispy tortilla chips. This spicy, fruity blend of fresh mango and lime will turn any dish into an exciting new favorite. Great with seafood!
ingredients: Mangos, Tomatoes (tomato juice, citric acid, calcium chloride), Onions, Jalape¤os, Lime Juice Concentrate, Garlic, White Vinegar, Cilantro, Natural Flavors, Cayenne Pepper

name: Spicy Corn Relish
intro: Our Southwest inspired Spicy Corn Relish will add a nice kick to your favorite Mexican and TexMex cuisine. Spice up a plate of nachos, load onto fish tacos or use as an accompaniment with your highly acclaimed chili. You may even want to turn it up a notch for your next playoff party.
ingredients: Corn, Pure Cane Sugar, Onions, Cider Vinegar, Red Bell Peppers, Chilis, Jalapeno Peppers, Salt, Guar Gum, Xanthan Gum, Mustard Seed, Black Pepper, Cayenne Pepper, Celery Seed, Turmeric

name: Spicy Tomato Salsa
intro: This Spicy Tomato Salsa is a zesty complement to fish, pork or chicken. Mix with cream cheese and use as a savory spread for crackers, muffins or biscuits. Or mix our Spicy Tomato Salsa with sour cream for a nacho chip dip or taco topping.
ingredients: Tomatoes (tomato juice, citric acid, calcium chloride), White Vinegar, Jalapeno Peppers, Onions, Pure Cane Sugar, Garlic, Lime Juice Concentrate, Cilantro, Salt, Crushed Red Pepper Flakes.

name: Cranberry Horseradish Sauce
intro: Perfect with your favorite roast or as a spread on a turkey sandwich, our uniquely tart and spicy Cranberry Horseradish Sauce is a delicious blend of contrasting flavors. It goes great with smoked meats and seafood too!
ingredients: Cranberries, Pure Cane sugar, Water, Horseradish (horseradish, water, vinegar, salt, soy oil, natural flavors), Orange Juice, Citric Acid, Spices.

name: Horseradish Cream Sauce
intro: Horseradish lovers everywhere rejoice! This Horseradish Cream Sauce is simply the best spread for a roast beef sandwich. The horseradish is intense and this creamy sauce is a smooth topping with the hearty kick of horseradish to bring out the best flavor of the beef. Add our Horseradish Cream Sauce to pan sauces, vinaigrettes or potato salads for incredible flavor. Also great as a dip for veggies.
ingredients: Grated Horseradish Root, Water, White Distilled Vinegar, Soybean Oil, High Fructose Corn Syrup, Sugar, Eggs, Modified Corn Starch, Salt,Lemon Juice, Xanthan Gum, Artificial Flavors,Sodium Metabisulfite (preservative), Citric Acid,Spices, Sodium Benzoate (preservative), Paprika,Calcium Disodium EDTA (retains product freshness)

name: New England Cocktail Sauce
intro: Everybody knows that the best New England Cocktail Sauce comes from Maine. We like classic food here in New England and one of our all time favorites is the shrimp cocktail. So what better way to enjoy a fresh shrimp cocktail than with zesty, traditional New England Cocktail Sauce. We give ours a delicious snap of flavor with horseradish, a little lemon and just the right seasonings.
ingredients: Ketchup (tomato concentrate, distilled vinegar, high fructose corn syrup, salt, spice), Chili Sauce (tomatoes, corn syrup, vinegar, salt, onion powder, dextrose, spices, natural flavoring, garlic powder), Horseradish (horseradish roots, vinegar, salt), Water, Worcestershire Sauce (distilled vinegar, molasses, water, sugar, onions, anchovies [fish], salt, garlic, cloves, tamarind extract, natural flavors, chili pepper extract), Pepper Sauce (cayenne peppers, vinegar, salt, natural flavor, garlic), Lemon Juice

name: Tequila Lime Cocktail Sauce
intro: Dive in - the flavors are great! We've taken a classic seaside recipe and perked it up with a splash of tangy Tequila and lime. It's a refresing twist on an old favorite that will create quite a buzz around the table the next time you serve shrimp, crab cakes or other seafood.
ingredients: Chili Sauce (tomatoes, corn syrup, vinegar, salt, onion powder, dextrose, spices, natural flavorings, garlic powder), Pure Cane Sugar, Water, Lemon Peel, Pepper Sauce, (cayenne peppers, vinegar, salt, natural flavors, garlic), Lime Juice Concentrate, Tequila, Cilantro, Chili Powder, Spices, Salt

name: Habanero Mango Hot Sauce
intro: A sensational combination of flavors. Our Habanero Mango Hot Sauce is a sensational combination of habanera, mango, curry and mustard. It adds a nice kick to steamed vegetables, scrambled or deviled eggs and is great secret ingredient to add to sauces.
ingredients: Mustard (mustard seed, vinegar, water, turmeric, chili pepper), Brown Sugar, Mango Pur‚e, White Vinegar, Raisins, Habanero Pepper Pur‚e (habanero peppers, citric acid), Spices, Curry Powder, Chili Powder, Salt

name: Buffalo Wing Sauce
intro: A New York Classic. We've come up with our own take on the classic Buffalo wing sauce made famous by a certain town in New York. Spicy, hot and tangy this sauce makes finger lickin' good wings. Fry, broil or bake wings with this sauce and let the party begin. Serve traditionally with blue cheese and celery sticks, or use the sauce to top a burger, make pork chops sizzle or add a kick of flavor to any pan sauce.
ingredients: Water, Cayenne Mash (cayenne peppers, salt, vinegar), Cider Vinegar, Unsalted Butter (milk), Tomato Paste, Worcestershire Sauce (distilled vinegar, molasses, water, sugar, onions, anchovies [fish], salt, garlic, cloves, tamarind extract, natural flavors, chili pepper extract), Brown Sugar, Molasses, Gum Acacia, Xanthan Gum, Dried Garlic, Dehydrated Onion, Spices, Liquid Smoke (water, natural hickory smoke concentrate).

name: Honey Mustard Dip
intro: Slightly sweet and full of zest, this dipping sauce is fantastic for pretzels, grilled sausage, shrimp or chicken. Add to potato or egg salads for great flavor.
ingredients: Honey, Pure Cane Sugar, Dijon Mustard (water, mustard seed, vinegar, salt, white wine, citric acid, turmeric, tartaric acid, spices), Water, Mustard Powder, Lemon Juice Concentrate.

name: Dipping Pretzels
intro: Right out of the bag, the best pretzels you've ever snacked on! Satisfy the urge to snack with these crunchy pretzels. Made in small batches, the recipe for these Dipping Pretzels create what we think are the best. They are baked to just the right firmness. These pretzels are full of great flavor, perfect for dipping into mustard, dips or your favorite spread. Best of all, these crunchy pretzels are a terrific snack all on their own.
ingredients: Enriched Wheat Flour (contains wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Salt, Malt, Vegetable Oil (contains one or more of the following: canola oil, corn oil, soybean oil), Leavening (contains one or more of the following: yeast, sodium bicarbonate, ammonium bicarbonate)

name: Seasoned Sea Salt Pretzels
intro: Intensely flavored sea salt brings out the best flavor of these snacking and dipping pretzels. Lightly seasoned and crispy. Made in small batches, the recipes for these pretzels create what we think are the best. They are baked to just the right firmness and full of great flavor, perfect for dipping into mustard, dips or your favorite spread. Best of all, these crunchy pretzels are a terrific snack all on their own.
ingredients: Ingredients in Pretzel: Enriched Wheat Flour (contains wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Salt, Malt, Vegetable Oil (contains one or more of the following canola oil, corn oil, soybean oil), Leavening (contains one or more of the following: yeast, sodium bicarbonate, ammonium bicarbonate) Ingredients in Seasoning: Corn Oil, Worcestershire Sauce (contains vinegar, molasses, high fructose corn syrup, anchovies [fish], water, onions, salt, garlic, tamarind concentrate, cloves, natural flavorings, chili pepper extract), Sea Salt Produced in a facility that uses peanut butter.

name: Yellow Tortilla Chips
intro: Made from some of nature's finest, golden yellow corn, these authentic Tortilla Chips are the best you've ever tasted. Crunchy and full flavored with just the right amount of sea salt, you may not want to wait and just eat them right out of the bag. Try them with our delicious salsas and dips for an exceptionally satisfying treat.
ingredients: Stoneground Yellow Corn, Sunflower Oil and/or Safflower Oil, Sea Salt Produced in a facility that handles dairy and sesame seeds.

name: Blue Corn Tortilla Chips
intro: Add a splash of color to your next fiesta with our delicious Blue Corn Tortilla Chips. Made with real blue corn and a hint of salt, these tasty, crunchy chips add authentic southwest flavor to nachos, soups and Tex-Mex recipes. Crisp and satisfying, you may end up eating them right out of the bag. We do!
ingredients: Stoneground Blue Corn, Sunflower Oil and/or Safflower Oil, Sea Salt

name: Guacamole Spice Mix
intro: With our easy and flavorful Guacamole Spice Mix you can enjoy everyone's favorite Mexican dip in no time. Made with just the right amount of spices, onion, tomato, garlic, jalapeno and lime for that classic South of the Border flavor, you just need to add the avocado. Serve with fresh, crisp tortilla chips or use this dip in your favorite recipe. It's Muy Bueno!
ingredients: Maltodextrin, Dehydrated Onion, Tomato, Garlic, and Jalapeno, Dextrose, Salt, Spices, Lime Juice Concentrate, Citric Acid, not more than 2% Tricalcium Phosphate added to prevent caking.

name: Sea Salt Crackers
intro: Named "the best sea salt cracker," one taste will tell you why. These delicious, hand cut Sea Salt Crackers are simply superior! Crisp and distinctive, you'll love the subtle flavors and trace minerals from the coarse sea salt that's baked right into each cracker. They taste amazing in soup, paired with any cheese or you can just enjoy them right out of the box.
ingredients: Unbleached Enriched Wheat Flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Whole Milk, Butter (cream, salt), Sugar, Sea Salt.

name: Texas Rub
intro: Taste some tasty Texas barbecue. The big taste of Texas barbecue comes through in this rub. Brown sugar, molasses and select spices blend together to create a sweet and smoky version of a Lone Star state barbecue. It's easy to use and ideal for any cut of beef. Generously apply rub to meat and let rest for several hours or overnight in the fridge, then grill or roast.
ingredients: Brown sugar, spices, salt, molasses (molasses, maltodextrin), garlic powder, silicon dioxide added to prevent caking

name: Maine Seafood Rub
intro: Enjoy Maine seafood at its best. A beautiful filet of fresh Maine haddock or cod deserves to be cooked to perfection. This hand-blended mix of spices and salt complements the flavor of the fish without overpowering it. Add some to chowder, steamed shellfish or stews. Wicked awesome! For added flavor, generously apply rub to lightly oiled seafood 15-30 minutes prior to cooking, then sauté, grill or roast. Also, delicious used on white meats and vegetables.
ingredients: Spices, salt, paprika, silicon dioxide added to prevent caking

name: Chicken & Pork Spice Rub
intro: A delicious secret ingredient. Add flavorful dimension to chicken or pork with our classic Chicken & Pork Spice Rub. This savory combination of spices complements each other and enhances the flavor of your meal. Generously apply rub to lightly oiled chicken pieces or whole chicken. Let rest several hours or overnight in the fridge. Roast or grill until juices run clear. Also, delicious used on pork, seafood and vegetables.
ingredients: Granulated Garlic, Kosher Salt, Coarse Ground Black Pepper, Whole Thyme, Crushed Oregano, Canola Oil

name: Maine Sea Salt
intro: Harvested from the coast of Maine. Full of distinctive flavor. Sun-dried on Bailey Island, Maine, this Sea Salt is unrefined and free of additives, making it full of flavor with just the right texture. The cool, mineral-rich waters of the Gulf of Maine provide our natural sea salt with a unique flavor. The seawater is simmered over an open, hard wood fire to harvest the flavorful sea salt. Once the heat is reduced, the sea salt is solar evaporated in shallow green house pools. The crystal size makes Maine Sea Salt ideal for use in a salt grinder or for adding to recipes by hand.
ingredients: Sodium 54.6%, Chloride 35.4%, trace minerals: Sulfur 3.7%, Magnesium 6,400mg/kg, Potassium 2,300mg/kg, Iron5.4mg/kg, Zinc

name: Maine Maple Syrup
intro: Our native state's best. The best maple syrup comes from New England. Our pure Maple Syrup is the only thing we use on pancakes, waffles and French toast. The clarity of the amber color and the rich sweetness of maple can't be compared. Maple Syrup is a wonderful addition to salad dressings, squash recipes or used to glaze sautéed veggies.
ingredients: 100% Pure Grade A Dark Amber Maine Maple Syrup

name: Wild Maine Blueberry Syrup
intro: Bursting with bright blueberry flavor. For pancakes, waffles, French toast and your favorite beverages. Mix this brightly flavored Blueberry Syrup into your favorite smoothie recipe for great taste and a healthy dose of antioxidants. Delicious served traditionally with pancakes or French toast, Stonewall Kitchen Wild Maine Blueberry Syrup is also great drizzled on top of ice cream or a biscuit topped with fresh berries and whipped cream.
ingredients: Pure Cane Sugar, Water, Wild Maine Blueberries, Blueberry Concentrate, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum.

name: Honey Barbecue Sauce
intro: A sweet barbecue sauce with a kick. Add just the right amount of sweet, smoky zest to barbecued meats with this robust Honey Barbecue Sauce. Use this top selling Honey Barbecue Sauce as a glaze for meats or poultry, or add to homemade baked beans for a delicious kick of sweet honey and zest!
ingredients: Sugar, Water, Tomato Paste, Honey, Brown Sugar, Mustard (water, mustard seed, vinegar, salt, white wine, citric acid, turmeric, tartaric acid, spices), Cider Vinegar, Onion, Garlic, Spices, Salt, Citric Acid, Capsicum Oil

name: Black Peppercorn Grinder
intro: A must-have for any kitchen. The peppercorns in this grinder are picked just before the berries are fully ripe to give you delicious ground pepper that has a slightly hot taste with a hint of sweetness. Designed to be both handy and attractive looking, this Black Peppercorn Grinder is ideal for use in the kitchen and will be welcome at the table when guests come to call.
ingredients: Peppercorns

name: Maple Chipotle Grille Sauce
intro: Stonewall Kitchen's top selling and award winning Maple Chipotle Grille Sauce adds savory flavor to grilled vegetables and meats. Blended with fiery chipotle peppers for a truly distinct sauce perfect for all your grilled meats.
ingredients: Water, Sugar, Tomato Paste, Brown Sugar, Tomatoes (tomatoes, salt, citric acid), White Vinegar, Maple Syrup, Molasses, Soy Sauce (water, wheat, soybeans, salt), Spices, Garlic, Salt, Onion, Mustard (water, mustard seed, vinegar, salt, white wine, citric acid, turmeric, tartaric acid, spices), Canola Oil, Xanthan Gum, Curry Powder, Chipotle Pepper, Citric Acid

name: Chocolate Chip Pancake & Waffle Mix
intro: Not just for breakfast anymore. Decadent chocolaty chips fill these delicious pancakes. These decadent pancakes are filled with chocolaty rich chips and make you wonder whether you should serve these Stonewall Kitchen Chocolate Chip Pancakes to your weekend guests for breakfast or dessert? Either way they are sure to be a hit as pancakes or waffles, morning or night.
ingredients: Malted Wheat Flour, Chocolate (sugar, chocolate liquor, cocoa butter, chocolate liquor processed with alkali, soy lecithin [an emulsifier], salt), Corn Flour, Sugar, Malt, Natural Flavors (maltodextrin, enzyme-modified cocoa butter, sunflower lecithin), Monocalcium Phosphate, Sea Salt, Buttermilk, Baking Soda, Sodium Acid Pyrophosphate  Contains: Wheat, Milk, Soy
olive oil
intro: Natural product made from 100% olive oil, no additives or preservatives, gluten free, not a diary product. Use our olive butter as a healthier alternative to butter or other solid fats. It's great spread on bread, rubbed on steak or chicken before cooking.
name: El Marques Original Flavor Olive Oil Butter

ingredients: olive oil, garlic
intro: Natural product made from 100% olive oil, no additives or preservatives, gluten free, not a diary product. Use our olive butter as a healthier alternative to butter or other solid fats. It's great spread on bread, rubbed on steak or chicken before cooking.
name: El Marques Garlic Olive Oil Butter

ingredients: olive oil, black truffle
intro: Natural product made from 100% olive oil, no additives or preservatives, gluten free, not a diary product. Use our olive butter as a healthier alternative to butter or other solid fats. It's great spread on bread, rubbed on steak or chicken before cooking.
name: El Marques Black Truffle Olive Oil Butter

ingredients: olive oil, rosemary, sage, thyme
intro: Natural product made from 100% olive oil, no additives or preservatives, gluten free, not a diary product. Use our olive butter as a healthier alternative to butter or other solid fats. It's great spread on bread, rubbed on steak or chicken before cooking.
name: El Marques Herbed Olive Oil Butter

ingredients: olive oil, tomato
intro: Natural product made from 100% olive oil, no additives or preservatives, gluten free, not a diary product. Use our olive butter as a healthier alternative to butter or other solid fats. It's great spread on bread, rubbed on steak or chicken before cooking.
name: El Marques Tomato Olive Oil Butter

ingredients: olive oil, natural lycopene
intro: Extra virgin olive oil enriched with natural lycopene. The nutritional quality in the oil makes it ideal to enrich the healthy properties of other foods: dairy products and derivatives, sauces and dressings, pastry products, patés and spreads, meats, dietetic and infant food. Its addition to foods simmer-ed or ice cream is also possible and is fully compatible with other functional foods.
name: El Marques Olicopene
NEW 2014 Sandy Oaks Olio Nuovo
intro: Sandy Oaks Olio Nuovo, a limited edition of new oil we offer once a year, is a blend of oil pressed from olives produced at Sandy Oaks annually. Since not all olive tree varietals produce annually, each year's edition is unique. Our 2014 oil is especially delicious. It presents a fruity, peppery flavor with hints of grass.

Our Sandy Oaks Olives are hand picked, brined, and then packed in a mixture of brine and white wine vinegar with peppercorns and garlic. Simply delicious, they are "Olives With A Texas Accent", that will grace your table or your martini.
name: Sandy Oaks Olives
Olive Leaf Jelly
intro: Our Olive Leaf Jelly is a light, refreshing spread made from olive leaf tea. It tastes wonderful on a biscuit, atop cheese, as a companion to nut butters or as a glacé for grilled meat. Our chef loves to use it as an ingredient in salad dressings. And, Sandy has been known to eat a spoonful by the light of her open fridge to satisfy a midnight sweet tooth attack.

name: Olive Leaf Tea
intro: Brew a curative and delicious cup of tea. Olive leaf tea has twice the antioxidants of green tea and 400% more vitamin C than other sources of vitamin C. From the first sip, you'll wonder how something so delicious can be so good for you.

Sandy Oaks Extra Virgin Olive Oil is a blend of Arbequina and Arbosana, both Spanish varietals. Arbequina olive oil is noted for its mild fruity flavor, while Arbosana is noted for its peppery flavor. Our blend gives you a fruity flavor at the front of the mouth, with a peppery finish at the back. Whether you sauté your favorite vegetables or meat, dip a crusty bread into it, or use it in your favorite salad dressing, you will want to make this oil a staple in your pantry.
name: Sandy Oaks Extra Virgin Olive Oil Blend
Chef'sChoice Electric Slicer
intro: Offering professional-quality features for the home cook, this fine German machine does it all – from shaving meats and cheeses for panini to prepping vegetables for grilling.

name: OXO Egg Beater
intro: It may look nostalgic, but the updated design of this new-fashioned egg beater guarantees 21st-century performance, whether you’re making a frittata or whipping cream. The exceedingly smooth and powerful gear mechanism is fully enclosed.

name: Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Deep Skillet
intro: With its deep sides, Le Creuset's enameled cast-iron skillet is well suited to stovetop frying, pan roasting and small oven braises. Part of the innovative Signature collection, the pan seamlessly blends classic form with the latest ergonomic innovations.

name: All-Clad Electric Indoor Grill
intro: All-Clad designed and engineered this countertop electric grill just for Williams-Sonoma. Because its two cooking surfaces are controlled separately, you can simultaneously grill foods like steaks and seafood that require different heat levels, from gentle warming to a sizzling sear.

name: Stainless-Steel Sliding Skewers
intro: If you enjoy grilled kabobs, you’re probably familiar with the challenge of removing the cooked food from the skewer. Our skewers solve the problem with a sliding disc that lets you push food onto a plate with one controlled motion.

name: OXO Citrus Juicer Press
intro: Constructed of die-cast aluminum, OXO’s sturdy citrus squeezer fully extracts the juice from lemon and lime halves. The soft, nonslip handles absorb pressure and provide a firm grip.

name: Stainless-Steel Hammered Cocktail Shaker
intro: The timeless beauty of hand-hammered metal makes our cocktail shaker a sophisticated addition to any home bar. A great gift for your favorite mixologist, it helps whip up perfectly chilled cocktails, from martinis and gimlets to sidecars and manhattans.

name: Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
intro: Maraschino cherries go back to their Italian roots. Produced in Luxardo, Italy, these cherries are nothing like the bright red orbs you find in cocktails from workaday bars. Dense and chewy with a sweet-tart flavor, these maraschino cherries are made with prized sour marasca cherries preserved in the fruit’s famed liqueur. They’ll take your Manhattan (or Shirley Temple) to new heights and are also delicious spooned with their rich syrup over ice cream or cheesecake.
ingredients: Marasca cherries, sugar, marasca cherry juice, glucose, citric acid, natural color, Maraschino natural flavor.

name: OXO Muddler
intro: Crushing, or “muddling”, limes and mint for cocktails such as mojitos and caipirinhas is easier than ever thanks to this efficient bar tool from OXO. A soft, nonslip grip makes it comfortable to hold. Sturdy, die-cast zinc is weighty and durable, and a nylon head won’t scratch glasses.

name: Mason Jar Cocktail Shaker
intro: Pour on the Southern hospitality with cocktails mixed in this all-American Mason jar shaker. Created by W+P Design, it’s the brainchild of two gents who grew up below the Mason-Dixon Line and know a few things about mint juleps and fine bourbon whiskey. Retrofitted with a strainer and cap, the roomy glass jar holds plenty of ice for perfectly chilled, ultracool cocktails.

name: Breville Juice Fountain Multi-Speed Juicer
intro: Select from five speeds to handle everything from delicate fruits to crispy vegetables with the Breville Juice Fountain Multi-Speed BJE510XL. An innovative smart chip in its 900-watt motor automatically boosts power to the cutting disc under heavier loads, resulting in faster more efficient juice extraction.

name: Schott Zwiesel Cru Classic Champagne Flute
intro: These Cru Classic flutes from Schott Zweisel are both beautiful and extremely durable, and they will maintain their sparkling clarity through years of daily use. The tall, slim bowls are designed to showcase the bouquet, flavor and bubbles of Champagne and other sparkling wines while the graceful stems are proportioned for optimal stability. Favored by premier restaurants and hotels around the world, this elegant stemware is perfect for entertaining at home.

name: Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Saucepan
intro: Inspired by nearly a century of culinary craftsmanship, the Signature collection seamlessly blends Le Creuset's classic form and feel with ergonomic and functional innovations. The rounded base and high sides make this pan ideal for mixing and cooking sauces.

name: Mulling Spice Mugs
intro: Chase away the winter chill with our clear glass mugs, perfect for mulled wine, hot cider, Irish coffee or a winter cocktail of your own creation. Dishwasher safe. 15-oz. cap., 5" high. Set of four. Made in Mexico. A Williams-Sonoma exclusive.

name: Williams-Sonoma Margarita Salt Tin, Lime
intro: Margaritas make the party – and our tangy lime margarita salt adds the finishing touch to a knockout margarita. Run a lime wedge along the rim of your glass, dip the moistened rim in our container of lime-flavored sea salt, harvested from the pristine waters of the Pacific Ocean, and let the fiesta begin!
ingredients: Sea salt, cane sugar, crystallized lime (citric acid, evaporated cane juice, lime oil, lime juice, ascorbic acid).
oconut milk, sugar, egg yolks, sea salt, citric acid, carob gum. Comes in an 8 oz jar. Refrigerate after opening. NOTE: Made in a facility that processes nuts and eggs. CONTAINS TREENUTS.
intro: Meet the peanut butter of Southeast Asia! Hey Boo's Cristina Widjaja cooks up her take on the wildly popular Indonesian spread of her childhood in her new hometown, San Francisco, California. These sweet little jars of coconut jam are made by slowly cooking eggs, sugar and coconut milk to creamy, spreadable perfection. Cristina's coconut jam gets its beautiful yellow color from the orange-hued yolk of cage-free eggs. It's sweet and tropical, with a melt-in-your-mouth creaminess that we can't get enough of. We'll never give up peanut butter, but this spread is our new favorite alternative to fruity jellies and citrusy marmalades.
name: Coconut Jam

intro: Artisanally produced with high quality natural ingredients, this caramel sauce blends the creaminess of coconut milk into classic caramel making, resulting in a product that is both delicious and dairy free.
name: Coconut Caramel

intro: Artisanally produced with high quality natural ingredients, this Mango Srikaya is the perfect blend of the creamy deliciousness of coconut milk and the bright aroma of mango.
name: Mango Coconut Jam
Breville Bit More™ Toaster, Long Slot 4-Slice
intro: Enjoy toast and bagels just the way you like them, every time. This stainless-steel Breville toaster offers smart design features that make checking and perfecting toast easy, including a special "A Bit More" button that provides just a touch more browning, and a Lift and Look feature lets you check on toasting progress.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer Combi Whip & Mixer Bowl
intro: When you want to make small batches of batter with your KitchenAid Professional stand mixer, use this convenient half-capacity mixing bowl and combination whisk/flat beater. Also ideal for whipping cream or egg whites, it provides a welcome break from washing the mixer's larger bowl between tasks.

ingredients: Wheat flour, palm oil, brown cane sugar, kosher salt, yeast, seeds (sesame, poppy, sunflower, pumpkin), cheddar cheese, black pepper, black truffles, kalamata olives, feta, rosemary, garlic, parsley, scallions, smoked paprika, olive oil. CONTAINS DAIRY. CONTAINS WHEAT.
intro: Former Bouley pastry chef Lina Kulchinsky makes one of New York City's best pretzels. Everything is baked in small batches using an German-style process and a Mediterranean, Latin and Russian influenced recipe. The famous soft pretzels are baked daily in her East Village bakery, and whatever is not sold is seasoned and toasted until golden. These are savory with a hint of sweetness. Crunch with a little give. Fantastic! You will need them everyday. Why 'Sigmund?' "Balthazar was taken," says the baker.
name: Pretzel Chips

ingredients: Goat's milk, organic sugar, organic cornstarch, baking soda
intro: Goat Milk Caramel, also known as cajeta, is a luscious treat. It has a silky texture and a wonderfully complex, tangy flavor. There's almost a roasted nutty bitterness – like the top of a creme brûlée – with the consistency of a rich and creamy sauce. Fat Toad Farm is a family affair – mom, dad and daughters working together with their herd of goats at their Vermont farm to create these exceptional caramel sauces.
name: Goat Milk Caramel Original

ingredients: Goat's milk, organic sugar, organic cornstarch, baking soda, organic cinnamon sticks
intro: Goat Milk Caramel, also known as cajeta, is a luscious treat. It has a silky texture and a wonderfully complex, tangy flavor. There's almost a roasted nutty bitterness – like the top of a creme brûlée – with the consistency of a rich and creamy sauce. Fat Toad Farm is a family affair – mom, dad and daughters working together with their herd of goats at their Vermont farm to create these exceptional caramel sauces.
name: Goat Milk Caramel Cinnamon
Cuisipro Apple Corer
intro: Coring apples is a smooth and easy task with this ergonomically designed tool. Just line up the shaft with the apple core and gently twist into the fruit, then release the core with the thumb tab.

name: Williams-Sonoma Traditional Finish Square Cake Pan
intro: Brownies, bar cookies, corn bread and cakes bake to perfection in our square cake pans. Made for us in the USA, the aluminum-coated steel pans heat quickly and evenly for consistent results.

ingredients: caramelized onion, water, garlic, tamarind puree, madras spice blend (coriander, cumin, fenugreek, mustard seed, fennel, peppercorn, cardamom, turmeric), organic cane sugar, ginger, organic sunflower oil, sea salt, organic white distilled vinegar, serrano chile, red chile flake, new mexico chile powder
intro: Celebrating the vibrant flavors of India’s Spice Coast, our creamy golden sauce is prepared just as it would be in an Indian home. Every step is accomplished by hand, from chopping and sautéing ingredients to stirring the sauce as it slowly simmers, creating a complex layering of flavors. Use a lot for a curry or a little for a quick stir-fry. The possibilities are endless.
name: Madras Cooking Sauce

ingredients: caramelized onion, tomato paste, water, garlic, organic sunflower oil, organic cane sugar, masala spice blend (cumin, coriander, clove, fennel, star anise, cardamom, cinnamon, peppercorn), mango powder, turmeric, organic white distilled vinegar, ginger, sea salt, serrano chile, new Mexico chile powder
intro: A fresh interpretation of a classic indian curry, our rustic base enhances foods with vibrant flavors of the indian sub continent. Prepared just as it would be in the villages of Northern India, our sauce is made with caramelized onions, ginger, tomatoes and our special spice blend. We've chopped and cooked the ingredients, so you can enjoy deep, complex flavors – without spending all day in the kitchen. Enjoy with your favorite protein or vegetable, served over rice, with naan or even on top of a salad.
name: Masala Cooking Sauce

ingredients: caramelized onion, organic white distilled vinegar, water, organic cane sugar, garlic, vindaloo spice blend (cumin, coriander, cinnamon, fenugreek, cardamom, mustard seed), organic sunflower oil, ginger, sea salt, new mexico chile powder, spanish paprika, serrano chile, turmeric, red chile flake
intro: A bold update on this classic dish from the Indian state of Goa. Our signature sauce combines over a dozen spices and several chile powders, blended with the perfect ratio of vinegar and brown sugar that gives Spicemode's Vindaloo it addicting sweet and spicy flavor.
name: Vindaloo Cooking Sauce

ingredients: vindaloo spice blend (fenugreek, mustard, coriander, cumin, peppercorn, cinnamon, green cardmom), kosher salt, brown sugar, smoked spanish paprika, arbol chile powder, roasted garlic, crushed ginger, onion, red chile flake
intro: Our signature seasoning is simply just amazing! This blend builds on the sweet and spicy profile of our Vindaloo Cooking Sauce. It is a balanced with ginger, garlic, smokey chile powders, brown sugar, salt and our signature Vindaloo Masala.
name: Vindaloo Fire Seasoning

ingredients: masala spice blend (cumin, coriander, clove, star anise, peppercorn, cinnamon, black cardamon), roasted garlic, crushed ginger, kosher salt, spanish paprika, new mexico chile powder, lemon, spearmint, cilantro leaves
intro: A seasoning inspired by the classic Garam Masala spice blend and regional herbs. Think of it as an east meets west citrus & herb rub. Sprinkle it directly on your favorite meat, fish or vegetables. This blend included over a dozen spices and aromatics. Makes it super easy to prepare tasty, globally-insprired food at home.
name: Masala Herb Seasoning

ingredients: tandoori spice blend (cumin, coriander, clove, star anise, fennel, peppercorn, cardamon, tumeric), smoked spanish paprika, kosher salt, brown sugar, garlic, new mexico chile powder, onion flakes, crushed ginger, fenugreek leaves
intro: Our Tandoori spice rub is inspired by the classic Northern Indian tradition of clay oven bbq. In the traditional recipes proteins or paneer are marinated in a spiced yogurt before grilling. This blend included over a dozen spices and aromatics - makes it super easy to prepare tasty, globally-insprired food.
name: Tandoori Smoke Seasoning
Ginger Syrup
intro: Our original ginger syrup is piquant yet sweet, like liquefied, freshly grated ginger
ingredients: cane sugar, ginger

name: Grenadine Syrup
intro: Real pomegranate highlights this classic syrup with hints of vanilla and orange blossom
ingredients: cane sugar, filtered water, pomegranate juice concentrate, tart cherry juice concentrate, orange flower water, vanilla bean puree

name: Spiced Apple Syrup
intro: Rich New York State Apple Cider is blended with a warming blend of mulled spices
ingredients: cane sugar, apple molasses, filtered water, apple cider, orange peel, chili, cinnamon

name: Bear Pond Espresso Syrup
intro: This syrup is a rich, creamy espresso with earthy notes.
ingredients: filtered water, cane sugar, Bear Pond Espresso, ginger, birch, cedar

name: Zoku Duo Quick Pop Maker
intro: Create your own customized frozen pops, two at a time, including cream-filled varieties, in as little as seven minutes. Simple and easy to use, our freezer ensures flavorful fun for the whole family.

name: Williams-Sonoma Traditional Finish Cookie Sheet
intro: Designed to promote even baking and browning of pressed, rolled and dropped cookies and pastries, our American-made cookie sheet heats quickly and evenly to ensure uniform baking.

name: Four-in-One Avocado Tool
intro: Peeling, pitting and mashing an avocado is child's play with this multitasking tool. A serrated edge cuts through the skin, a curved tip detaches the pit and a scoop removes the flesh. A slotted masher makes quick work of the flesh.

name: Apilco Octagonal Platter
intro: Step into any Parisian charcuterie (which you'll recognize as a delicatessen) and see rows of white porcelain platters like these, neatly displaying the day's offerings of sausages and pâtés. Designed with elegant clipped corners, they'll be just as much at home on your dinner table or buffet. The thick white glaze complements most dinnerware, while the generous depth contains juices. They're made by Apilco, France's leading manufacturer of restaurant-quality porcelain wares.

name: Kosher Salt
intro: Great meals start here: after more than 50 years outfitting home kitchens with the best cooking essentials, we took on the pantry. Our new line of spices, salts, oils and other staples lets you begin every dish with the very best ingredients.
ingredients: Kosher salt

name: Tellicherry Peppercorns
intro: Commonly regarded as the finest of all peppercorns, the Tellicherry variety is treasured by cooks for its excellent flavor and pungency.

name: Cuisinart Electric Rice Cookers
intro: Providing perfect results every time, this efficient appliance takes the guesswork out of cooking rice. At the touch of a button, it steams rice to fluffy perfection, then automatically keeps it warm.

name: Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Fry Pan
intro: Inspired by nearly a century of culinary craftsmanship, Le Creuset's Signature collection is an evolution of its enameled cast-iron cookware, blending classic form with ergonomic innovations. With its expansive surface and superior heat retention, this Signature fry pan is a versatile kitchen mainstay.

name: Professional Multi-Chopper
intro: Instead of enlisting an army of specialized knives for slicing, dicing, wedging and coring fruits and vegetables, use this one easy-to-operate tool. Mix and match its three pushers and four interchangeable blades to prep everything from apples to carrots to onions.

name: Microplane Herb Mill
intro: Place parsley, cilantro, dill, sage and mint in this mill, then just twist the handle – the ultra-sharp scissoring blades quickly mince even large quantities of herbs for flavorful salad dressings, sauces and more.

name: Traditional Flour Sifter
intro: Convenient to use, this stainless-steel sifter helps to aerate flour and give it more volume, ensuring a standard measure and uniform texture in baked goods.

name: Citrus Zester
intro: Use this tool to cut tiny pith-free strips of citrus peel, releasing oil for flavoring salad dressings and pastries.

name: Williams-Sonoma Turkish Bay Leaves
intro: Harvested from the Mediterranean bay laurel tree, our Turkish bay leaves are much milder and have a more complex flavor than their domestic cousins. Use them to add a delicately sweet astringency to your favorite dishes. Just one or two leaves will enhance a large roast or pot of homemade soup.
ingredients: Turkish bay leaves.

name: Williams-Sonoma Orange Blossom Honey
intro: n the lush climate of Florida, flowers and trees produce abundant blossoms, and the local bees produce some of America’s finest honey, naturally flavored with their aromatic pollen. Our signature honey trio offers three favorites – light-bodied Tupelo, medium-bodied Wildflower and full-bodied Orange Blossom – crafted by the bees and carefully harvested by local beekeepers using centuries-old apiarist methods. And because it’s never heated, filtered or pasteurized, our raw honey maintains all its natural vitamins, minerals and flavor.
ingredients: 100% honey.

intro: Elite chefs depend on All-Clad's Copper Core cookware because of its superb responsiveness to heat, essential for making reductions and sauces. This handsome sauté pan is perfect for sautéing, searing and deglazing over high heat.
name: All-Clad Copper Core Deep Sauté Pan with Splatter Screen
All-Clad Stainless-Steel Locking Tongs
intro: All-Clad invests these tongs with the same quality as its famous cookware. Made of polished 18/10 stainless steel, they feature a locking handle for compact storage and scalloped edges that firmly but gently grip foods so they won't tear apart.

name: Wüsthof Classic Utility Knives
intro: A kitchen essential for peeling, slicing and trimming fruits and vegetables, this German utility knife features a blade forged from stain-resistant high-carbon steel. Its full tang, riveted to the nonslip polypropylene handle, guarantees peerless balance and control.

name: Williams-Sonoma Thermo-Clad™ Stainless-Steel Saucepan
intro: We developed our new Thermo-Clad™ cookware drawing on over five decades of culinary experience, designing every element to provide years of great results in your kitchen. Available only at Williams-Sonoma, Thermo-Clad™ is crafted in Italy to our precise specifications using an exclusive aluminum alloy that provides up to 35% better thermal conductivity than other aluminum-clad metal cookware on the market. Use this high-performance saucepan for everything from simmering sauces and gravies to cooking grains or vegetables.

name: Zeroll Ice Cream Scoop
intro: The scoop of choice in American ice cream parlors since 1935, this handy tool carves out plump round scoops. Its unique handle draws on the natural warmth of your hand to ease molding the frozen treats.

name: Garlic Peeler
intro: It's amazing how easily this floppy tube peels a clove of garlic. Simply insert whole unpeeled cloves, press down firmly, and briskly roll back and forth for a few seconds, until you hear the peel snap.

name: Williams-Sonoma Coarse Brazilian Sea Salt
intro: Distinguished by its clean, delicate flavor, this sea salt is hand harvested from the pristine waters off the coast of Brazil. The mineral-rich crystals have a natural resistance to moisture and clumping, so they're ideal for grinding in salt mills.
ingredients: Sea salt.

name: Chef'n Citrus Juicer
intro: Thanks to an inverted press, this tool quickly extracts every drop of juice from halved limes, lemons and small oranges for flavorful cocktails, baking and cooking.

name: Microplane Box Grater
intro: Incorporating four of Microplane's American-made precision cutting blades in one easy-to-use tool, this sleek box grater handles everything from vegetables and citrus to hard cheeses and chocolate.

name: 10-Piece Glass Bowl Set
intro: You can never have too many bowls for prepping or combining ingredients. This set includes a full range of sizes – ten in all – for holding everything from a few strands of saffron to all the ingredients for a cake. Perfectly simple in design, they're useful as serving pieces too.

name: Breville Crispy Crust Pizza Maker
intro: If you love pizza as much we do, we predict Breville's compact countertop machine will change your life. Thanks to powerful dual heating elements and a built-in baking stone, it produces extraordinary, brick- oven-style pizzas in about ten minutes. Whether you prefer New York's classic thin pizzas or hearty thick crust pies, you'll enjoy crispy, golden crusts and perfectly cooked toppings—every time.

name: Rotary Cheese Grater
intro: Grate cheese, chocolate and other foods with this kitchen essential, or put it to work making breadcrumbs. Easy to use, it keeps your fingers safe from harm—after placing the food into the chute, use the pusher to press it against the inside grating surface. An ergonomically shaped wavy handle gives your fingers a secure grip.

name: Williams-Sonoma Nutmeg
intro: A pantry staple around the world, nutmeg is the hard, speckled seed of an apricot-like fruit produced by a tropical evergreen. Culinary professionals and dedicated home cooks agree that the rich, spicy character of nutmeg is best elicited by grinding or grating the aromatic seed just before using.
ingredients: Nutmeg.

name: William Bounds Nutmeg Grinder
intro: Nutmeg tastes best when it's freshly grated, and a little bit of this aromatic spice goes a long way. This tool makes it easy to grate just the right amount.

name: Nielsen-Massey Vanilla Extract
intro: Only the best vanilla from the island of Madagascar is intense enough for Nielsen-Massey, purveyor of premium pure vanilla products since 1907. Long the choice of bakers and ice-cream makers, this extract adds depth and flavor no other vanilla can match.
ingredients: Water, alcohol (35%), sugar, vanilla bean extractives.

name: All-Clad 4-Square Waffle Maker
intro: We worked closely with All-Clad for two years to conceptualize and design this superb machine that makes thick, golden waffles that are deliciously crispy on the outside and meltingly tender inside, with deep pockets to hold plenty of toppings.

name: Dial-A-Slice Apple Divider
intro: Unlike most apple slicers, this tool produces two sizes of uniformly sliced apples. With a downward push, it cores an apple and cuts it into thin slices for use in baking and cooking, or thicker wedges for eating out of hand.

name: Williams-Sonoma Granulated Honey
intro: One of nature's sweetest delights, honey has long been used to enhance a variety of sweet and savory foods. Offering the delicate flavors of liquid honey in an easy-to-use form, our granulated honey is perfect for cooking, baking and everyday sweetening.
ingredients: Granulated honey (sugar, honey).

name: Cole & Mason Electric Salt & Pepper Mills
intro: With these battery-powered mills you can dispense salt or pepper ground to your desired coarseness at the touch of a button. A mini light illuminates the area below the mill – handy for twilight grilling and candlelit dinners.

name: Silpat Silicone Cookie Sheet Liners
intro: Before baking your next batch of cookies or sticky buns, cover the baking sheet with this flexible nonstick liner from France and enjoy the difference it makes.

name: Dual Blade Pasta & Pastry Cutter
intro: Whether you’re making ravioli, pastries or sugar cookies, this handy dual-blade cutter will simplify the job. Fluted and straight-edged stainless-steel rotary blades cut effortlessly through any dough.

name: Natural Parchment Paper Roll
intro: A time-saving kitchen staple, our heavyweight parchment paper is treated with a pure vegetable coating for all-natural cooking, baking and food prep. Use it for everything from lining cake pans and cookie sheets to wrapping tamales or steaming foods en papillote.

name: Rösle Garlic Press
intro: Garlic is universally loved – but not on the hands. Instead of chopping it, use this well-designed stainless-steel tool to minimize your hands' contact with the pungent garlic juices. It's made by Rösle, one of Europe's leading manufacturers of professional cooking utensils.

name: Cole & Mason Granite Mortar & Pestle
intro: This mortar and pestle are made from solid black granite—a beautiful complement to natural kitchen surfaces. The unpolished interior surface has a rough texture that aids in grinding garlic, whole spices and fresh herbs and in making pesto, curry pastes and other sauces.

name: Maple Rolling Pin
intro: Our well-designed rolling pin lets you transform dough into a thin disk of pastry without stretching, tearing or overworking it.

name: Williams-Sonoma Goldtouch Nonstick Muffin Pan
intro: This American-made pan is designed to promote even baking and browning, ensuring that muffins develop bakery-style crowned tops and are released in perfect shape. The pan’s  Goldtouch coating prevents sticking and cleans up in seconds.

name: All-Clad Deluxe Slow Cooker with Cast-Aluminum Insert
intro: All-Clad's top-of-the-line cooker features a nonstick cast-aluminum insert that you can use on the stovetop to brown ingredients before transferring it to the base for slow cooking.

name: Williams-Sonoma Extra-Fine French Grey Sea Salt
intro: Known in France as sel gris (grey salt), this rich, bold sea salt derives its distinctive grey color from the natural clays at the bottom of salt ponds off the French Atlantic coast. The pure sea salt is hand-harvested using centuries-old Celtic techniques, then naturally dried by the heat of the sun.
ingredients: French grey sea salt.

name: Steel Cooling Rack
intro: Freshly baked cakes, cookies and breads cool uniformly on this rack, which is elevated to keep their undersides crisp.

name: Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Square Grill Pan
intro: Inspired by nearly a century of culinary craftsmanship, Le Creuset's Signature collection seamlessly blends its classic form with ergonomic and functional innovations. This grill pan is designed for draining excess drippings and features a large loop handle for easy lifting and serving.

name: Kyocera Adjustable Ceramic Peeler
intro: Equipped with an ultrasharp ceramic blade, this precision tool shaves outer layers from produce with effortless speed. The blade is made of zirconium oxide ceramic, which is second only to diamond in hardness and stays sharp far longer than steel.

name: Wüsthof Classic 5" Tomato Knife
intro: Wüsthof's serrated tomato knife slices easily through tomato skins and works equally well for cutting citrus fruits and cheeses. Made according to the highest standards of German craftsmanship, the hand-honed blade is triple riveted to the high-impact handle.

name: Fini Balsamic Vinegar
intro: This superb balsamic vinegar is made in Modena, Italy, from sweet white Trebbiano and Lambrusco grapes. It's aged approximately 12 months, growing richer and darker as it's transferred to smaller and smaller barrels, each made of different aromatic woods: oak, chestnut, mulberry and juniper. The end result is a rich, syrupy balsamic with deep and complex flavor.
ingredients: 100% balsamic vinegar.

name: Dexas Cutting Board
intro: Made from durable, lightweight polypropylene, this versatile cutting board is handy for everything from preparing meats to slicing breads and chopping produce. Ideal for everyday use, it goes into the dishwasher for easy, thorough cleaning.

name: J.K. Adams Pig Cutting Board
intro: Inspired by a vintage American cutting board, this pig-shaped maple board comes in handy for prep work, serving appetizers or as a playful kitchen accent. It’s made in the USA of North American maple, lightly distressed and stained for an antiqued look.

name: Tulip Birch Wood Salad Servers
intro: Tossing and serving fresh salads is a pleasure with these elegantly shaped servers. They are crafted of Vermont birch, which reveals natural golden-honey tones. 14 3/4" long. Made in the USA. Set of two.

name: Williams-Sonoma Balloon Whisks
intro: We designed and developed our exclusive line of stainless-steel kitchen tools by drawing upon more than fifty years of culinary experience. These professional-quality utensils are crafted of heavy-gauge stainless steel and ergonomically designed for excellent balance and control—for a difference you can really feel in the hand. Our balloon whisk features an innovative and exclusive tine design that provides more aeration than your standard balloon whisk, so it whips ingredients 20% to 30% faster. Use it for whipping cream and beating egg whites.

name: Green Herb Snips
intro: Designed to retain herbs' flavorful essential oils, these scissors make it easy to snip fresh herbs for soups, salads and other dishes.

name: Cuisinart Hand Mixer with Storage Case
intro: This versatile hand mixer provides the perfect speed for every task – whether you’re whipping cream, mixing a batter or making cookie dough. As easy to store as they are to use, the compact mixer and its high-performance attachments tuck neatly into their own custom case.

name: Pillivuyt Porcelain Cake Stand
intro: Like those seen in French patisseries, this cake stand is made for elevating all kinds of baked goods, from whole cakes to assorted cookies and pastries. Or use it for serving savory bites like hors d'oeuvres, cheeses and tea sandwiches. Made of white porcelain with a gently raised rim, it creates an eye-catching display. Made in France by Pillivuyt, a producer of porcelain tableware since 1818.

name: Aged Balsamic Vinegars
intro: Sandy Oaks offers a selection of flavored balsamic vinegars: Basil and Chili, Blueberry, Raspberry, or Cinnamon. We enjoy each for the individual flavor it adds to vinaigrettes made with Sandy Oaks Olive Oil. You can also reduce each to make delicious syrup to serve over--what else--olive oil ice cream.

name: Bamboo Matcha Whisk
intro: Used to prepare matcha powdered tea in a match bowl. Hand-split from a single piece of bamboo. To prepare matcha, whisk 1 teaspoon of matcha powder and 6 oz of hot water for one to two minutes with bamboo whisk until frothy.

name: Sur La Table Stainless Steel Fondue
intro: Our gleaming stainless steel fondue pot adds an elegant touch to any party. Whether you’re serving a cheese fondue appetizer or a sweet chocolate-dipped dessert, this user-friendly pot ensures quick and easy preparation.
ingredients: Stainless Steel

name: Cuisinart Stainless-Steel Ice Cream Maker
intro: When it comes to homemade ice cream, “the more, the better” is the motto of this family-friendly machine. Ideal for entertaining, it makes two quarts of your favorite frozen dessert in a single batch.

name: Breville Milk Café Electric Frother
intro: Create rich, creamy, perfectly frothed milk for your favorite coffee drinks with this easy-to-use fully automatic frother from Breville. An induction heating system allows it to reach temperature rapidly, efficiently and consistently.

name: Jack Daniels Tennessee Honey
intro: Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Honey is a blend of Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Whiskey and a unique honey liqueur of our own making, for a taste that’s one-of-a-kind and unmistakably Jack. With hints of honey and a finish that’s naturally smooth, Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Honey is something special.

name: Double Infusion Iced Tea Pitcher
intro: Whether you’re just brewing hot or iced tea or craving a special fresh fruit infused tea, this heat resistant pitcher makes preparation easy with three inserts – one for steeping full-leaf loose teas and herbs, one for infusing fruit and one for chilling the tea.

name: Le Creuset Heritage Stoneware Oval Covered Casserole
intro: Bringing back vintage designs from Le Creuset's archives, the Heritage Stoneware collection is a durable, versatile choice for one-dish baking, serving and storing. This cocotte's oval shape is specifically designed for roasts and poultry as well as casseroles.

name: Teak Wooden Spreader
intro: These teak utensils are hand-crafted in Thailand from beautiful teak wood which comes from the excess material that the logging industry leaves behind. No additional trees were cut down to specifically create these products. Durable and beautiful teak wood utensils will add a beautiful dimension to your serving as well as offer years of use. These tools are Stonewall Kitchen branded and make for excellent gifts as well.

name: Exclusive Paring Knife
intro: As the name implies, paring knives are used primarily for paring and trimming vegetables and fruits but can also double as a small utility knives. Often considered to be the 2nd most used knife in a kitchen, you will find yourself reaching for this one again and again.

name: California Extra Virgin Olive Oil
intro: Made from Arbequina olives, this delectable olive oil is delicious right out of the press and requires no extra processing. Its mild, buttery flavor tastes remarkable on bread, in marinades, salads or in cooking.
ingredients: 100% Arbequina Extra Virgin Olive Oil

name: Balsamic Fig Vinegar
intro: Our perfect balance of sweet figs and tart balsamic vinegar creates a uniquely rich and multilayered flavor experience. It's great on salads, as a marinade or drizzled over cooked vegetables or rice.
ingredients: Grape Must, Aged Wine Vinegar, Fig Juice. Contains naturally occurring sulfites.

name: Batter Bowls Textured
intro: A new classic made especially for Stonewall Kitchen our Batter Bowls are truly essential in any kitchen. Sturdy and simple in design, these stoneware batter bowls are a great tool for bakers and are complemented by our other Stoneware Classic pieces. Each batter bowl features a handle for easy gripping, a spout for easy pouring and is just the right size to mix up a batch of muffin batter or pancake batter. Keep the counter cleaner by pouring batter from the spout and, of course the bowls are dishwasher safe. Each has a 7 cup capacity.

name: Breville Handy Mix Digital - Chrome
intro: If you worry about under or over mixing your recipes, this digital hand mixer is for you. Featuring a digital LCD display with a count up timer, you'll always know exactly how well mixed your ingredients are. There are also 16 speeds to choose from and a turbo option that provides an extra burst of power when you need it. The flat beaters are made of stainless steel and are dishwasher safe. Also includes an extra-long five foot power cord.

name: Belgian Waffle Maker
intro: Make Professional Belgian Waffles with this electric cast iron waffle maker. Maker makes individual, 7-inch round, thick, Belgian-style waffles. Durable, handsome chrome housing and nonstick waffle grids for easy clean-up. Six-level browning control and cool-touch handles. Stands upright for easy storage.

name: Stoneware Prep and Serving Bowls
intro: These beautifully crafted, stoneware prep and serving bowls are the perfect addition to your entertaining collection. Select from each unique, decorative design to create your own festive assortment.

name: Emile Henry Artisan Ruffled Pie Dish
intro: he rustic charm of kitchen ceramics in an Emile Henry 1850s catalog provided the inspiration for the French company's Artisan series of bakeware. Each pie dish is shaped from Burgundian clay, which absorbs, distributes and retains heat evenly, so pies bake and brown to perfection. The dish's generous proportions and scalloped rim make it ideal for baking deep-dish fruit and savory pies that will be served at the table. Because its hand-applied glaze won't scratch or craze, you can use sharp utensils for slicing a pie.

Inspired by nearly a century of culinary craftsmanship, Le Creuset's Signature collection of enameled cast-iron cookware seamlessly blends classic form with ergonomic  innovations. Designed to enhance slow-cooking by heating evenly, this Dutch oven locks in moisture for tender, succulent dishes.
name: Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Round Dutch Oven

intro: Le Creuset's heart-shaped Dutch oven enables you to cook with love. Enameled cast-iron ensures steady, even heating for a bubbling stew, potpie or baked dessert and keeps food warm for an attractive tableside presentation. Available for a limited time only.
name: Le Creuset Cast-Iron Heart-Shaped Dutch Oven

intro: Staub's innovative enamel coating takes cast-iron cooking to the next level with improved performance, style and durability. This versatile pan, ideal for braising and slow-cooking, transitions seamlessly from the oven to the table for an attractive presentation.
name: Staub Cast-Iron Braiser

ingredients: Tomatoes (fresh vine-ripened California tomatoes, tomato puree, salt, citric acid), Water, Tomato Paste, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Ginger (ginger, citric acid), Unsalted Butter (milk), Canola Oil, Brown Sugar, Chicken Stock (chicken stock, natural flavor, salt, sugar, yeast extract), Spices, Sea Salt, Turmeric, Dried Chiles, Gum Acacia, Xanthan Gum
intro: Sometimes known as Murgh Makhani in Indian restaurants, our Butter Chicken recipe features a rich, creamy sauce made with tomatoes, ethnic spices and simple ingredients like onion, butter and peppers. Just pour over cooked meat, simmer and serve with naan or steamed rice for a delicious, authentic meal at home.
name: Butter Chicken Simmering Sauce

intro: Saffron is one of the few things that truly are worth its weight in gold. This product of the crocus flower adds not only pungent aromatic flavor to foods, but also vibrant color. With a certified color score of 200+, this is one of the best Saffron's available in the world. Elite quality Spanish "Coupe" Saffron is so good you just need to follow the adage "less is more" as just a pinch will go a very long way. This is because of the exceptionally quality of this specific crop, in comparison Saffron with an ISO rating of Category 2 (150-170 color score) yields just one fourth the potency of our product. Saffron botanical name is Crocus Sativus, it is estimated that it takes a little more than 14,000 stigmas to produce only one ounce of saffron (Did you know they are picked by hand?). So remember you are paying for quality and that will become evident as you smell and use this wonderful "Coupe" variety from Spain. Lab tested for purity /color potency both at the source (Spain) and domestically (NYC/USA).
name: Plaza Coupe Saffron

ingredients: Water, Red Wine, Onion, Unsalted Butter (milk), Tomato Paste, Carrot, Garlic, Chicken Stock (chicken stock, natural flavor, salt, sugar, yeast extract), Canola Oil, Soy Sauce (water, wheat, soybeans, salt), Dried Garlic, Freeze Dried Mushrooms, Pure Cane Sugar, Gum Acacia, Xanthan Gum, Gluconic Acid, Dehydrated Onion, Spices .
intro: Our true appreciation of French cooking inspired us to create this sauce. It is the traditional, somewhat elaborate and time consuming recipe made simple. All the complex flavors of red wine, mirepoix (minced onions, carrots and celery) and a little tomato blend to make this rich and truly flavorful sauce.
name: Coq Au Vin Simmering Sauce

intro: Stone ground chocolate is not something we see often in this day and age, especially not well-made stone ground chocolate. Taza took an age’s old process of making chocolate and developed it into a line of products that highlights the true flavors of ethically sourced, organic cacao in a unique, distinctly Mexican style chocolate made with Oaxacan style stone mills. Enjoy their chocolate covered nuts at work or at home; either way, you'll be deliciously glad you did.
name: Taza Stone Ground Chocolate Semi-Sweet Baking Squares

intro: A stylish serving pitcher for beautiful tea presentation for guests. Ideal for iced teas, this tall glass pitcher showcases the clarity and color of our premium teas. Not heat-resistant, do not use to steep tea.
name: Bel Air Iced Tea Serving Pitcher

ingredients: Enriched Wheat Flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Buttermilk (1% cultured milk, salt, sodium citrate), Canola Oil, Sugar, Salt, Olive Oil, Baking Soda
intro: Extra virgin olive oil adds a depth of exceptional flavor to these hand cut crackers. Perfect to serve with cheese, olives or soup. Pure, cold press olive oil adds distinctive flavor to these Olive Oil Crackers. The subtle flavor makes these Olive Oil Crackers ideal for serving with soups, salads or strong cheeses.
name: Olive Oil Crackers

intro: Torn Ranch Maple Glazed Pecans are hand-crafted by our skilled artisans. They begin by craft roasting mammoth pecan halves and applying a light glaze made with real maple syrup and a proprietary blend of spices. The glaze seals in the freshly roasted flavor of the pecans while preserving their delicious crunch. Packaged in a convenient grab and go pouch, you can enjoy this gourmet snack anywhere.
name: Torn Ranch Maple Glazed Pecans

intro: .Originating deep in the Yukatan, Kahlua has a flavour as rich and distinct as the region. Kahlua has a vibrant taste and lingering coffee finish, and .it can be served neat over ice, mixed with milk or cola, and is used in a variety of cocktails.
name: Kahlua Coffee Liqueur

intro: Tartlet pans have been a Williams-Sonoma favorite since 1960, when Chuck Williams introduced our customers to the pleasures of baking classic French pastries. These versatile little pans make it easy to create perfectly formed shells for your favorite fillings.
name: Tartlet Pan, Set of 6

intro: Stone ground seed, spices and honey are blended to make this very special German-styled mustard, with a rich taste that enhances stir-frys, sausages, cheeses, salads and dressings. It adds just the right touch to your favorite sandwiches.
name: Willamette Valley Sweet 'N Hot Stone Ground Mustard

intro: Our all-natural peanut butter blended with fiery spices. This spicy peanut butter is tasty on crackers and vegetable sticks like carrots and celery. Also great to cook with -- try it in satays, stir-fries, curries, barbecue sauce, buffalo wings, or chili. It contains no cholesterol, no trans fats, no hydrogenated oils, and no high-fructose corn syrup.
name: The Heat Is On

intro: Le Creuset's classic pie dish bakes a beautifully even-finished, golden pie that you can bring to the table in style. Enameled stoneware is exceptionally durable and retains heat well, so your dessert stays warmer for serving.
name: Le Creuset Stoneware Pie Dish

intro: Caveman Blue cheese is a rich, complex blue that is deliciously sweet and fruity with slight vanilla tones and a texture of butter and crystals. Although its moniker and mold-riddled exterior imply a lack of refinement, these wheels are anything but. A rugged natural rind allows the Caveman to release a bit of moisture and develop a thick, buttery texture. During its maturation, luscious raw cow milk and blue cultures are transformed into a golden-hued paste which tastes of sweet, fresh buttermilk with nuances of beef and bacon, tropical fruit, grass and hay.
name: Caveman Blue Cheese
Microplane Box Grater
intro: Incorporating four of Microplane's American-made precision cutting blades in one easy-to-use tool, this sleek box grater handles everything from vegetables and citrus to hard cheeses and chocolate.

Perfect for picnics, tailgate parties, camping and more, this incredibly portable, self-contained gas grill can be folded up for transport almost anywhere with its convenient carry handle. Despite its compact size, it still delivers 225 square inches of grill space.
name: O-Grill Portable LP Gas Grill

intro: Made in the USA of commercial-grade aluminized steel, this pan is endlessly useful for baking jelly rolls, pastries and cookies. Its Goldtouch nonstick surface releases baked goods intact and cleans up with ease.
name: Williams-Sonoma Goldtouch Nonstick Jelly Roll Pan

intro: Kernels of corn bring summer-fresh sweetness to soups, salads and salsa. They're easy to trim from the ear with this tool, which works quickly and helps protect fingers.
name: Kuhn-Rikon Corn Zipper

intro: For pure, all-round enjoyment, we lovingly hand-rub our aged Asiago wheels with an exotic melange of sun-dried tomatoes, onions, garlic and ancho peppers infused in extra-virgin Spanish olive oil. When the salsa rub has air cured, we wrap the wheels again to further marry the flavors. Sometimes, we must confess, a little salsa dancing also takes place.
name: Salsa Asiago

intro: Citrus and spicy are just what your grilled salmon needs. If the fish aren't swimming, Lime Chipotle will give your roast pork the perfect Tex-Mex taste.
name: Saucy Mama All Natural Lime Chipotle Marinade

intro: Whether you're cooking for a smaller family or looking for an easy way to prepare side dishes, this compact countertop machine will save you time in the kitchen. It couldn’t be simpler to operate – just add ingredients to the ceramic insert, set the timer, and let the machine do the rest. When you're ready to dine, the insert goes right to the table for serving.
name: All-Clad Slow Cooker with Ceramic Insert 4 Qt

intro: Inspired by vintage Kentucky mint-julep cups, these elegant vessels are the traditional way to serve everyone’s favorite Derby-day cocktail. Embellished with distinctive detailing and finished in gleaming silver plate, they make wonderful gifts for festive occasions from weddings, anniversaries and birthdays to race-day celebrations
name: Presidio Silver-Plated Julep Cup

intro: Fun as well as functional, these double-walled glass cups create a dramatic “floating liquid” effect when beverages are poured inside. Two walls of borosilicate glass produce an insulating layer that keeps hot drinks hot while remaining cool to the touch outside. These cups are ideal for serving warm beverages such as coffee, tea, hot chocolate and mulled cider; they also keep cold drinks cold.
name: Double-Wall Glass Coffee Cups

intro: Introducing the largest, most powerful – and quietest – KitchenAid mixer we've ever offered. With a generous 7-qt. capacity, this machine equips home bakers with a full range of high-performance commercial features for fast, efficient mixing and quality results.
name: KitchenAid Pro Line Stand Mixer

intro: Inspired by nearly a century of culinary craftsmanship, this Le Creuset chef's oven is especially useful for reducing soups and simmering risotto and other grains. Its gently rounded shape facilitates whisking, and its depth and broad surface area speed evaporation.
name: Le Creuset Cast-Iron Chef's Oven

intro: With rows of sharp teeth, this durable grater effortlessly shreds fresh gingerroot while leaving unwanted fibers behind. The ceramic surface is impervious to acids and oils and won't transfer flavors. A silicone ring on the base prevents slipping.
name: Ceramic Ginger Grater

ingredients: Tomatoes (fresh vine-ripened California tomatoes, tomato pur‚e, salt, citric acid), Water, Heavy Cream (milk), Onion, Fire Roasted Tomatoes, Tomato Paste, Ginger, Garlic, Lime Juice, Unsalted Butter (milk), Canola Oil, Spices, Chicken Stock (chicken stock, natural flavor, salt, sugar, yeast extract), Brown Sugar, Sriracha (red chili, garlic, sugar, vinegar, salt, natural flavor), Smoked Paprika, Kosher Salt, Cilantro, Dried Garlic, Gum Acacia, Xanthan Gum, Onion Powder, Cilantro Oil
intro: Creamy in consistency, light in color but uniquely bold in flavor, Tikka Masala takes taste buds in new directions by delivering layers of interesting spice combinations that open worlds of flavorful possibilities. Aromatic and delicious. Tikka Masala is a wonderfully robust recipe that is enjoyed worldwide.
name: Tikka Masala Simmering Sauce

intro: Grinding whole spices and nuts just before use ensures optimal flavor and aroma. Designed especially for these ingredients, Cuisinart's compact grinder uses a powerful motor and sharp stainless-steel blades to process them to the preferred texture. It's easy to operate: Just press the lid. The removable stainless-steel grinding bowl comes with an additional airtight lid for use when storing ingredients in the bowl.
name: Cuisinart Spice & Nut Grinder

intro: People call this "Country Gold". This traditional recipe Colby Cheese will have you dreaming about your childhood. Mild, creamy and delicious! Weights are approximate and can vary, due to being hand-crafted.
name: Colby Longhorn Cheese

intro: Lodge Cast Iron is America's original cookware and the oldest family-owned cookware foundry in the US. This 12" skillet is made from heavy duty cast iron, preseasoned and ready for cooking right out of the box. This pan is exceptionally durable, features even heat distribution and is of heirloom quality. It's a superb addition to your kitchen and rugged enough to go camping too!
name: Lodge Logic 12" Skillet

intro: Patterned after designs found in Le Creuset's archives, the Heritage collection re-creates its vintage enameled cast-iron cookware from 50 years ago. Perfectly sized, this saucepan is ideal for everything from simmering sauces to cooking grains and vegetables.
name: Le Creuset Heritage Cast Iron Saucepan

intro: Whether you have plenty of time or no time at all, Breville’s versatile electric pressure cooker will have dinner ready when you are. Use the fast pressure setting to cook tender meats and veggies quickly – or layer on complex flavors with the slow-cook setting. The fully programmable cooker automatically switches to "keep warm," so you can simply set it and forget it.
name: Breville Fast Slow Cooker

intro: Staub's innovative enamel coating takes cast-iron cooking to the next level with improved performance, style and durability. Perfect for baking hearty gratins, crisps and casseroles, this French favorite is designed to deliver a crispy brown crust atop an evenly cooked dish.
name: Staub Cast-Iron Oval Gratin Baking Dish

intro: The NuWave Infrared Oven cooks up to 50% faster and uses up to 85% less energy than conventional ovens. No longer do you need to waste time preheating, and, you can cook from frozen to fabulous with no defrosting time required. Foods cooked in the NuWave are healthier too because no additional fats are required. Your food cooks quickly and evenly, sealing the natural juices and removing more unwanted fats.
name: NuWave Pro Infrared Owen

ingredients: rosemary, cracked fennel, thyme, savory, basil, French tarragon, dill weed, Turkish oregano, lavender, chervil and marjoram.
intro: Herbes de Provence combines sweet French herbs and flowery lavender with Italian herbs and fennel. Excellent for roasting chicken or Cornish hens, beef or pork tenderloin, rub on 1/2 -1 tsp. per pound. Hand-mixed from: rosemary, cracked fennel, thyme, savory, basil, French tarragon, dill weed, Turkish oregano, lavender, chervil and marjoram.
name: Penzey Spices Herbs de Province

intro: A classical blend of cracked Tellicherry black pepper, Muntok white pepper and coriander.
name: Penzey Spices Mignonette Pepper

intro: Our Spanish dried sausage comes packaged as a single pack of three links of Artisan Spanish Chorizo and weighs approximately 9 ounces per package. It is all natural, smoked, dried & cured, gluten free, with no fillers, nitrates or nitrites and is safe for consumption for up to 6 months after purchase.
name: Aurelia's Chorizo

ingredients: 100% honey
intro: From Gulf County, this rare variety is created by bees who feed on the nectar of blossoms from tupelo gum trees, which bloom for just a few weeks each year.
name: Williams-Sonoma Tupelo Honey
